translation.en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
translation.ig: Ugbu a, anyị nwere ụmụ oke ọnwa anọ na-arịabu ọrịa shuga mana ha anaghị arịazi ya.

translation.en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
translation.ig: Dr. Ehud Ur, ọkammụta nke ọgwụ na Mahadum Dalhousie nọ na Halifax, Nova Scotia na onye isi oche nke ngalaba ụlọ ọgwụ na sayensi ahụ nke Òtù Ọrịa Shuga ndị Kanada dọrọ aka na ntị na nnyocha ahụ ka nọ n’oge ndị mbụ ya.

translation.en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
translation.ig: Ka ndị ọkachamara ndị ọzọ, o kwenyeghị na a ga agwọtanwu ọrịa shuga, o depụtara na ihe nchọpụta ndị a enweghị mmetụta nye ndị nwere ọrịa shuga Taịp 1.

translation.en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
translation.ig: N'ụbọchị Mọnde, Sara Danius, onye odeakwụkwọ Nobel kọmitii maka akwụkwọ agụmagụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Swidin, kwuputara n'ihu ọha na ihe omume redio na Sveriges Redio dị na Swidin, mgbe o siere kọmitii ahụ ike inweta Bob Dilan gbasara mmeri na ihe nrite Nobel na mpaghara Akwụkwọ agụmagụ nke afọ 2016 o nwetara, na ha ahapụlarị mbọ ha na-agba inweta ya.

translation.en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
translation.ig: Danius si, "Ugbu a anyị anaghị eme ihe ọbụla. Akpọọlam oku ma zijere onye ya na ya kacha arụkọ ozi ịntaneetị ma nwetekwa ụsa nnabata. Ugbua nke ahụ zuru oke."

translation.en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
translation.ig: Na mbu,onye isi Ring, Jamie Siminoff, kwuru na ulo oru ya bidoro mgbe onughi mgbirigba ya n’ulo ahia ya di na ime ebe o na adoba ugboala ya.

translation.en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
translation.ig: O kwuru na ọ rụrụ mgbịrịgba ụzọ ji WiFi arụ ọrụ.

translation.en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
translation.ig: Siminoff sị na orire ahịa gbaliri elu ka ogosichara n'ihe nkiri Shak Tank n'afọ 2013 ebe ndị ndozi ihe ngosi jụrụ itinye ego na mbido.

translation.en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
translation.ig: Na ngwụcha 2017, e gosiri Siminoff na chanel igbe onyonyo QVC.

translation.en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
translation.ig: Ring dozikwara otu ikpe ha na ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ na-ahụ maka nchekwa, ADT Corporation nwere.

translation.en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ eziokwu na otu ọgwụ mgbochi aka na-ele anya egosila na o nwere ike ịbelata oke ndị mmadụ ji anwụ n'ihi ọrịa Ebola, mana ruo ugbu a, enwebeghi ọgwụ ọbụla gosiri hooha na o nwere ike ịgwọ onye bu ọrịa a.

translation.en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
translation.ig: Otu antibọdi, ZMapp, gosiburu olileanya, mana ka elebakwuru ya anya, achọpụtara na ọbaghị uru na-igbochi ọnwụ ka esiri chee.

translation.en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
translation.ig: Na nnwale PALM, eji ZMapp mere ihe nruba ama, nke a putara na ndi sayentist jiri ya mee baseline tunyere ogwugwo ato ozo.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
translation.ig: USA Jimnastiks kwadoro ozi Olimpik Kọmitii Amerịka dere ma kwere kwa na oge eruola mgbe onye ọbụla na-eme Olimpiks aghaghị ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ịhụ na ndị egwuregwu anyị niile nọ na nchekwa.

translation.en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
translation.ig: Anyi kwere na ihe USOC dere na odimma ndi egwuregwu anyi na klob ha nakwa egwuregwu ga enweta uru n’ihu karia ma o buru na enwe mgbanwe n’ulo oru anyi kama inapu ndi mmadu asambodo ha.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
translation.ig: Mpaghara jimnasktik nke obodo USA kwadoro nlebara anya nke onwe nke nwere ike igosi ka mmegbu nke ndị lanarịrị ihe mberede Larị Nassar kọwapụtara nwere ike ịbụ ihe metere aka a na-amaghị maka ya na anabatakwa mgbanwe ndị kwesịrị ekwesị.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
translation.ig: Egwuregwu Jimnastik nke mba USA na ndi USOC nwere otu ebumnobi - ime egwuregwu jimnastik, na ndi ozo, enweghi iyi-egwu dika ike kwere nye ogwu egwu isoro nro ha n’uzo n’enweghi iyi-egwu, ziri-ezi na gburu-gburu akwadoro akwado.

translation.en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
translation.ig: Na 1960 ga, Brzezinski rụụrụ John F. Kennedy ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ya ma mechaa rụọkwa otu ihe ahụ n'oge ọchịchị Lyndon B. Johnson.

translation.en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
translation.ig: N’ime nghọpụta nke 1976, ọ dụrụ Carter ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu ndị mba ofesi, wee rụzie ọrụ dịka Onye ndụmọdụ Nchekwa Mba (NSA) site na 1977 ruo 1981, na nnọchi Henry Kissinger.

translation.en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
translation.ig: Dịka NSA, o nyere Carter aka n’ijikwa ihe omume mbaụwa n’ụzọ kwesiri ekwesi, dị ka Nkwekọrịta Kampụ Devidi, 1978; ihazigharị mmekọrịta US–Chaịna n'afọ ndị dị na ngwụcha agbata afọ 1970 na 1980; Mgbanwe ọchịchị Iran, nke butere nsogbu njigide Iran, 1979; mbuso agha nke Sọviet n’ime Afghanistan, 1979.

translation.en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
translation.ig: Aghoputara ihe nkiri ahu Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone no n’ime ya maka nturu ugo di iche iche.

translation.en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
translation.ig: E deturu aha Gosling na Stone n'otu ndị nwere ịnweta akara nturu ugo Best Aktọ na Best Aktres, n'otu n'otu.

translation.en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
translation.ig: Nhọrọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Foto Kacha, Onye nhazi, Ọrụ nkiri fiim, Nhazi Kọstuum, Ọrụrụ fiim, Exigbo Egwu fiim Mbu, Nhazi mmeputa, Ọrụrụ Ụda, Mwụghari Ụda na Ezigbo Mmemme mbu.

translation.en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
translation.ig: Abụ abụọ sitere n’ihenkiri ahụ, Ọdishọn (Onye Iberibe Ahu Rọrọ Nrọ) na Obodo Kpakpandu gasị, nwetara aha maka abụ mbụ kacha mma. N’ihe nlere nke Lionsgate natara ntinye aka 26 — karia ihe ndi a.

translation.en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
translation.ig: Ka ụbọchị Sọnde nọ na ngwụcha, Onye isi ọchịchị obodo Yunaịted Steeti bụ Donald Trọmp, kwuru n'ozi e nyere site n'aka onye ode akwụkwọ ndị nta akụkọ, nke sịrị na ndị agha obodo US ga ahapụ Sirịa.

translation.en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
translation.ig: E kwuputara nke a mgbe Trump na Onyeisiala mba Tọkị bụ Rejep Tayyip Erdoghan nwechara mkparịtaụka n'ekwentị.

translation.en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
translation.ig: Mba Turkey ga-anarakwa ichebe ndị agha ISIS enwudere ndị, ozi ahụ kwuru, na mba ndị dị na Europe ajụla ịnabata ha ọzọ.

translation.en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
translation.ig: Nke a na-egosi na, opekata mpe, ụfọdụ daịnosọọ nwere abụba; ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwere echiche a taa, mana ihe ọzọ bụ na ọ na-egosi anyị ihe fosịl enweghị ike igosi, dịka agba na nhazi akụkụ-atọ.

translation.en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
translation.ig: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị kwuru na abụba anụmanụ a nwere mgbe ọ na-acha aja aja n'elu ma na-acha ka karotenọịd n'okpuru.

translation.en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
translation.ig: Ihe nchọpụta ahụ nyekwara ntụziaka gbasara mmalite ipu nku n'ụmụ nnụnụ.

translation.en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
translation.ig: Maka na nku ajọ anụ daịnosọ enweghị akụ toro nke ọma, nke a na akpọ rachis, ma na o nwere ihe ndị ọzọ nke na-enwe - dịka barbs na barbules - ndị nchọpụta ihe kwuru na ọdịka rachis ọbụ ihe mechara si n'ihe ndị ọzọ a were toputa.

translation.en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.ig: Nhazi nku ha gosiri na ha ejighi ya efe efe kama ha ji ya edokwa okpomọkụ maọbụ eme ihe ngosi. Ndị nchọpụta ihe tụrụ aro sị na, n'agbanyeghị na nke a bụ ọdụ daịnosọ na-eto eto, ihe ngosi ahụ gosiri nku anụ tochara etocha na-abụghị nku nwa anụ.

translation.en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.ig: Ndị nchọpụta ihe tụrụ aro sị na, n'agbanyeghị na nke a bụ ọdụ daịnosọ na-eto eto, ihe ngosi ahụ gosiri nku anụ tochara etocha na-abụghị nku nwa anụ.

translation.en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
translation.ig: Otu bọmbụ gbawara n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii n’ime Gaziantep, Tọkii ụtụtụ ụnyaahụ na-egbu ndị uwe ojii abụọ ma merụọ ahụ ihe karịrị ndị mmadụ ọzọ iri abụọ.

translation.en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ gọvanọ kwuru iri na itoolu na ndị merụrụ ahụ bụ ndị uwe ojii.

translation.en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
translation.ig: Ndị uwe ojii sị na ha na-enyo otu onye a na-ebo ebubo na ọ bụ onye agha nnupuisi Daesh (ISIL) dịka onye mere mwakpo ahụ.

translation.en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
translation.ig: Ha chọpụtara na Anyanwụ na-arụ ọrụ n’otu ụdị isi iwu dịka kpakpandu ndị ọzọ: A chọpụtara na omume kpakpandu niile nọ na sistemụ bụ onwunwu ọkụ na ntụgharị ha na-anya ha, ma ọ nweghị ihe ọzọ..

translation.en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
translation.ig: A na-ejikọta ọnụ ọnwụnwụ ọkụ na ntụgharị ya amata akara Rossby nke otu kpakpando, nke metụtara na ọwụwụ plasma.

translation.en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
translation.ig: Ka akara Rossby na-adị obere karịa, ka arụmarụ na-adịkwu obere nke kpakpando n’ikwanye ugwu nye ụmụ ntụgharị nke ihendọta.

translation.en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
translation.ig: Na njem ya, Iwasaki banyere na nsogbu ọtụtụ mgbe.

translation.en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
translation.ig: Ndị ohi ụgbọ mmiri zuri ya ohi, nkịta ara lụsoro ya ọgụ, o siri na-alụm di na nwunye gbalaga na Nepal a tụọ ya nga na India.

translation.en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
translation.ig: Oke 802.11n na arụ ọrụ ma na frikwensi nke 2.4Ghz na nke 5.0Ghz.

translation.en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
translation.ig: Nke a ga-enye ya ohere ka dịrị na ndakọta nlaghachi azụ na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, ma ọ bụrụhaala na isi ebe ahụ ụgbọigwe na-anọ nwere redìò abụọ.

translation.en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
translation.ig: Na 802.11n, ọsịsọ ya ji nnukwu ihe kara nke ndị bu ya ụzọ; ya mere, ọrụ ọ na-arụpụta ga-eru 600Mbit/s.

translation.en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
translation.ig: Duval, bụ onye lụgoro nwanyị ma mụta ụmụ abụọ bụgoro okenye, a hapụghịrị Mila onyere akọọrọ akụkọ nnukwu ihe nlere anya.

translation.en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
translation.ig: Mgbe a sị ya kwuo okwu gbasara ihe mere, Mila kwuru, "Mike na-ekwu ọtụtụ okwu mgbe a na-eme ọnụnụ ahụ...anọ m na-akwado ya mere na anụghị m ihe ọ na-ekwu."

translation.en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
translation.ig: Anyị ga-agba mbọ belata ikuku kabon dioxide kwa nke Mkpokọta ihe nrụpụta obodo site na oke 2020 site n'ọkwa 2005, Hu kwuru.

translation.en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
translation.ig: O kwughi oke a ga-akwụ, kama ọ sị na a ga-ele anya na nrụpụta akụ na ụba China wee kwụọ ụgwọ.

translation.en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
translation.ig: Hu gbara obodo ndị na emepe emepe ume "ka ha ghara itinye aka n'usoro omume mgbe ochie bụ ibu ụzọ metọọ were kpochawa ma emechaa."

translation.en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
translation.ig: O tinyekwara na "ha ekwela ka adị ha buru ibu karịrị ogugo uto na ike ha."

translation.en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
translation.ig: Òtù Mmụta Irak ahụ gosipụtara nchọpụta ya na 12.00 GMT taa.

translation.en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
translation.ig: Ọ dọrọ aka na ntị sị na onweghị onye ga-ekwe nkwa na usoro ọbụla e jiri mee ihe na mba Aịrak ugbu a ga-akwụsị agha otu, ntolite ihe ike, maọbụ ndabanye n'ọgbaghara.

translation.en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
translation.ig: Di Rịpọt bidoro site n'ịkpọ oku ka onye ọbụla nwee mkpakọrịta ụka ma nwee nkwekọrịta n'Amerịka gbasara etu aga na-esi akpaso ndị Etiti Ọwụwa Anyanwụ agwa.

translation.en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
translation.ig: Ọ fọrọ obere ka mkpesa ahụ kwuo okwu ofụma gbasara akụkụ nile nke iwu ndị isi n'ebe mba Aịrak nọ ma ọ na-akwado mgbanwe ụzọ ozigbo ozigbo.

translation.en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
translation.ig: Nke izizi n'ime nkwado iri asaa na asatọ ya bụ na a ga-eso usoro ọchịchị ọhụrụ tupu ọgwụgwụ afọ ị hụ na echebere oke ala Aịrak megide ndị ọchọ okwu ma wughachikwa mmekọrịta ọchịchị ha na agbataobi ha.

translation.en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
translation.ig: Onye omeiwu nakwa nwunye onyeisiala mba Argentina bụ Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner mara ọkwa na mgbede ụnyahụ na La Plata, obodo nọpụrụ kilomita 50 (maịlụ 31)site na Buenos Aires na ọ ga-eso zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala mba Argentina.

translation.en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ n'Ajentaịn Tiyeta ka Lọọlọ Kirchner kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịzọ maka ọkwa onye isi ala, otu ebe ahụ ọ ji bido kampen ya maka ọkwa Sịnetọ na 2005 dịka onye otu nke ndị mpaghara Buenos Aires zigara.

translation.en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
translation.ig: Ọ bụ esemokwu maka mmefu ego na nkwado na nrụgharị e mere mgbe Oke ikuku Katrina gasịrị kpatara arụmụka a; ụfọdụ ndị kweere na iji nwayọ emefụ ego steeti akọwaala mmefụ a n'ụzọ ntọrọmọchị dịka "Nkwekọrịta Niu Ọlịns nke Bush mere".

translation.en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
translation.ig: Nnyocha nke mgbalị nrụgharị chere ihu na-enye ndị e chere na ha bụ ndị si Wọshịntịn ọrụ nrụgharị.

translation.en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
translation.ig: Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ anọ gara Rom maka olili ahụ.

translation.en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
translation.ig: Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nọ ebe n'ahụ dị ukwuu nke na o kweghị mmadụ niile omume inwèta òhèrè n'olili ozu na St. Peter Square.

translation.en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
translation.ig: Etinyere ọtụtụ nnukwu igwe onyonyo n'ọtụtụ ebe na Rom, ka ndị mmadụ nwee ike kirie mmemme ahụ.

translation.en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
translation.ig: N'ọtụtụ obodo Itali ndị ọzọ ma na uwa nile, ọkachasị na Poland, emere nkwazi dị ka ibe ya, nke ọtụtụ mmadụ hụrụ.

translation.en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
translation.ig: Ndị akụkọala akọtọla ụmụ iwuikikere FBI ndị gara aga maka ịgbado anya akụrụngwa n’ụmụ okwu ndị dị mfe ikpezi, tụmadị ụmụ okwu ụgbọ ala ezuru ezuru, n’iji ebumnobi nke ịkwalite nsìàga ọganihu ha.

translation.en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
translation.ig: Nzukọ omeiwu bidoro ikwado nnyocha ihe ndị dị aṅaa na fiskal n'afọ 2005 ma kwukwaa kpọmkwem na ngalaba FBI ga ewepụtarịrị ndị ozi iri maka ihe ngosi na-akpali agụụ mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị.

translation.en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
translation.ig: Robin Uthappa nwetara akara kachasị na innings, ọsọ 70 n’ime naanị ụmụ bọọlụ 41 site n’ịkụ anọ ugboro 11 na isii ugboro 2.

translation.en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
translation.ig: Ndị na-eji batị akụ n'usoro etiti, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma ma mee otu nrụkọọrụ nke ọsọ-otu narị.

translation.en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
translation.ig: Mana, mgbe ha dara wicket India naanị mere 36 gbara ọ tọpụ wicket 7 iji kwụsị innings.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
translation.ig: U.S. Onye isi oche Jiọj W. Bush batata Singapọ n'ụtụtụ ụbọchị nke iri na isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba, iji malite njem njegharị mba Eshia nke ga-anọzu otu izuụka.

translation.en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
translation.ig: Onye na-esote onye isi iche mba Sịngapọ bụ Wong Kan Seng nabatara ya ma ya na onye isi oche mba Sịngapọ bụ Lee Hsien Loong kparịtara ụka gbasara ahịa na ihe iyi ọha egwu.

translation.en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
translation.ig: Mgbe otu izu gasịrị ebe ọ dara ada na ntuliaka ọkara oge, Bush gwara ndị na-ege ya ntị maka mmụba nke azụmahịa n'Eshia.

translation.en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
translation.ig: Onye isi oche Stivin Hapa ekwetala iziga iwu ọhụrụ nke ikuku ọcha nke gọọmenti ebe a ga elebara ya anya, tupu nleba anya nke abụọ, ma emechaa nzukọ ga-ewe ya na onye isi NDP bụ Jak Leeton nkeji iri abụọ na ise n'ụbọchị Tuzde na PMO.

translation.en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
translation.ig: Layton arịọla maka mgbanwe nye akwụkwọ iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke ndị otu ọdịkaọgadị mgbe ya na PM nwere nnọkọ, na-arịọ maka "ndezigharị zuru oke nke zuru ezu" nke iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke ndị otu ọdịkaọgadị

translation.en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
translation.ig: Kemgbe gọọmenti weere ọnọdụ ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ ọgwụ Mersey na Devọnpọt, Tasmania, gọọmenti steeti na ụfọdụ ndị ome iwu gọọmenti etiti ekwuola okwu megide omume a sị na ọ bụ mere mere n'ihu maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gọọmenti etiti na-abịa na Nọvemba.

translation.en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
translation.ig: Mana Prime Minista John Howard ekwuola na ihe a mere bụ naanị ka ichebe ụmụ akụrụngwa nke ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ site n'aka mwedàta siri n'aka gọọmentị Tasmania, n'inye mmezi nke nde AUD$45.

translation.en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
translation.ig: Dika obere akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị ohuru si kwuo, ogugu oke osimiri gosiri na oke ikuku malitere. O doro anya na enwere oru oke ikuku na mpaghara Pago Pago na Niue.

translation.en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
translation.ig: O nweghị nnukwu mmebi ma ọ bụ mmerụ ahụ akọrọna n’ime Tonga, mana e were ọkụ nwa oge, nke a kọrọ gbochiri ndị ọchịchị Tongan ịnata ịdọ aka na ntị maka ajọ ebili mmiri PTWC ahụ nyere.

translation.en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
translation.ig: Ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na anọ na Hawaii ndị nọ na ma ọ bụ na nso akụkụ mmiri bụ ndị e mechiri na Wenezdee niile na-agbanyeghị ndọ aka na ntị niile ewepụrụ.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
translation.ig: Onyeisiala mba Amerịka bụ George W. Bush nabatara ọkwa ahụ.

translation.en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
translation.ig: Gọdọn Jọndro onye na-ekwuchitere Bush okwu kpọrọ nkwa Nọt Koria bụ "nzọụkwụ dị oke mkpa na ịnweta mwepụ were anya nke ngwa agha nuklia ndị Koria."

translation.en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
translation.ig: Oke ifufe nke iri abụrụ aha nke oge oke ifufe Atlantik, Oke ifufe akpọrọ Jeri, gbakọrọ n'oke osimiri atlantik taa.

translation.en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
translation.ig: Ụlọọrụ Etiti na-ahụ maka Ajọ ifufe (NHC) kwuru sị n’oge a Jeri abụghị ihe iyi egwu nye ala.

translation.en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
translation.ig: Ụlọ Ọrụ nke Ndị injinia nke U.S. mere atụmatụ na mmiri mmiri dị inchi isii nwere ike ịgabiga ihe mgbochi ide mmiri e mebibiri na mbụ.

translation.en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
translation.ig: Ward Itoolu, nke hụrụ oke ide mmiri ruru ihe dị ka feet iri abụọ n'oge Ajọ Ifufe Katrina, nọ na nnukwu mmiri na eru ukwu ma gafere akwa levee nọ nso.

translation.en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
translation.ig: Mmiri n’aghafu n’otu akuku levee obodobo ya di 100feet.

translation.en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
translation.ig: Onye nchikwa commons Adam Cuerden gosiputara iwe ya  n’elu ihe eghichapuru mgbe ogwara Wikinews okwu n’onwa gara gara.

translation.en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
translation.ig: O (Wales) n’ezie turu anyi asi site na mbido. Mbu, site na ikpa-agwa ka ihe a bu okwu iwu, Nke abuo, site na igho-aghugho na ona ege anyi nti, ruori mgbe ehichapuru nka ya.

translation.en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
translation.ig: Mkpadu iwe obodo butere maka mgbali ide iwu gbasara ihe ngosi mmekọahụ na webụsaịtị na-egosi ọtụtụ ihe.

translation.en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.ig: Ọrụ arụrụ bụkarịrị nke iwu a ka na enyocha enyocha, mana edere usoro omume ihe ahụ ka o gosipụta ihe ahụtara ụyọkọ kpakpando Sajiterius.

translation.en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
translation.ig: Mmetụta otu ahụ nọ na-achọ ga-esite n'aka ikikere taịdị ndị dị n'etiti mata ojii nke galaxy na mata ojii nke Milky Way.

translation.en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.ig: Dị ka ọnwa na etinye ndọta n’ụwa, na-akpata elili mmiri, etu ahụ ka Milky Way ahụ si etinye ike na galazi Sagittarius ahụ.

translation.en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
translation.ig: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị nwere ike kwubie na dak mata na emetụta dak mata ibe ya otu mata si eme.

translation.en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
translation.ig: Tiori a na-ekwu na imirikiti mata dị oji gburugburu otu ụyọkọ kpakpando dị na gburugburu otu ụyọkọ kpakpando n'otu ụdị halo, ma e mejupụtara ya site n'ọtụtụ urughuru dị obere.

translation.en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
translation.ig: Ụmụ akụkọ si telivishọn na-egosi anwụrụ ọcha si n'igwe nrụpụta ahụ apụta.

translation.en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
translation.ig: Ndị isi obodo na-adọ ndị bi n'obodo gburugburu igwe ọrụ ahụ aka na ntị ka ha nọrọ n'ime ụlọ, gbanyụọ ntụ oyi ma ghara iṅu mmiri na-agba n'ụlọ.

translation.en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
translation.ig: Na ndabere nke ụlọ ọrụ nuklia Japan, a chọpụtawo n'ụlọ mmepụta cesium na ayodiin dị redioaktivu.

translation.en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
translation.ig: Ndị isi chere na nke a na-egosi na o nwere ike gbọmgbọm ndị ji mmanụ ụgbọ yurenium agbawaala ma na-ehi ehi.

translation.en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
translation.ig: Dr. Toni Moll chọpụtara nje Tubakụlọsis (XDR-TB) nke na-emegide ọgwụ na ngalaba Sawụt Afrịka nke KwaZulu-Natal.

translation.en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
translation.ig: N'otu ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ sị na bke ọhụrụ a na enye "oke nsogbu ma bụrụkwa ihe egwu n'ihi ogugo ọnwụ dị elu si na ya abịa."

translation.en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ ndị ọrịa enweela ike ibute ọrịa ahụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ, Dr. Moll cheere, ma ihe dị ka abụọ bụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọgwụ.

translation.en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
translation.ig: Na otu afo n’abia abia, onye butara nje nwere ibunye ya mmadu 10 ruo 15 n’eru ya nso.

translation.en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị, pacentị nke XDR-TB nọ n’ime òtù niile nke ndị nwere ụkwara nta ka yiri ka ọ dị obere; 6,000 nke mpokọta ndị mmadụ 330,000 nwetere ọrịa ahụ n’oge ọ bụla n’ime South Afrịka.

translation.en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
translation.ig: Satịlaịtị ndị ahụ, abụọ nke na-anyị arụ karịa nke gafere paụnd 1,000, ma na-ekwo ọsọ n’ọdịka maịlị kwa awa 17,500, sukọrọ ọnụ maịlị 491 n’elu Eluụwa.

translation.en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
translation.ig: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị sị na mgbasa nkụkọta isi ahụ butere dị ukwu.

translation.en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
translation.ig: Ha ka na anwale ịchọpụta etu ibu mkpọka ahụ dị ma etu ọ ga-esi emetụta Uwa.

translation.en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
translation.ig: United States Strategic Command nke ụlọ ọrụ Ngalaba Nchebe U.S. na-esochi irighiri ihe ahụ.

translation.en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
translation.ig: A ga-ezìga ozī nyocha nke nkata akpara n'otu weebụsaịtị ọha.

translation.en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
translation.ig: Otu dibia-bekee onye rubuuru oru ulo-ogwu umuaka nke pittsburgh, Pennysylvania ka aga ekpe ikpe banyere igbu-mmadu nke akpasuru-iwe ka ahuchara nne ya na azu ugbo-ala na-onwu n’ubochi Wednesde, ka ndi isi no na Ohio kwuru.

translation.en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
translation.ig: Ahuru Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, na Blue Ash, Ohio otu sobob di nso 15 miles n’ebe ugwu Cincinnati ka o dine n’ala n’akuku okporouzo naani ihe oyi bu tshirt na uwe ime, otu osi noro gosiri na ono n’okpuru ike ogwu.

translation.en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
translation.ig: Ọ dụrụ ndị ọrụ nche gaa na Oldsmobile Intrigue ojii ya nke nọ n’ụzọukwu narị ise n’itoanya.

translation.en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
translation.ig: Achọtara ozu Saroja Balasubramanian, onye dị afọ iri ise na atọ, ebe ahụ, ja akwa mkpuchi kpudoro ya.

translation.en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
translation.ig: Ndị uwe ojii kwuru na ahụ ahụ dị ka ọ nọọla ebe ahụ ruo ihe dị ka otu ụbọchị.

translation.en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
translation.ig: Okwu mbu ndị ahụ nke ọrịa ahụ n'oge a bụ ka a kọrọ n'ime ebe ọgwụgwụ May.

translation.en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
translation.ig: Ezi na ebu ọrịa ahụ, nke anwụnta na ebunyezi ndị mmadụ.

translation.en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
translation.ig: Ihe ndaputa a emela ka goomenti mba India bido mebe ihe dika izipu ndi na ejide ezi na mpaghara ometuru hinne, ikesa akwa mgbochi anwu nta makwa igba ogwu na-egbu pesti.

translation.en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
translation.ig: Ọgwụ mgbochi ensefalitis dị nde kwuru nde ka gọọmenti kwere na nkwa, nke ga-akwado ndị ọrụ ahụike maka afọ na-abịa abịa.

translation.en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
translation.ig: E gburu oge ịnye ndị ọrịa kacha metụta n'afọ a ọgwụ mgbochi maka ego adịghị nakwa enwere ọrịa ndị ọzọ ka ya mkpa igbochi.

translation.en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
translation.ig: N'afọ 1956 Słania gara Swiden, ebe afọ atọ gasịrị o bidoro ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi nke Swiden ma bụrụkwa onye isi mbinye.

translation.en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
translation.ig: O mepụtaara stampụ karịrị 1,000 maka Swidin na mba 28 ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
translation.ig: Oru ya bunke amaara nke oma na iti igba ma doo kwa anya nke oma na obu otu nime ndi amaara n’ezinulo nile na ndi philatelist. Ufodu lekwasiri anya nnoo na ichikota oru ya nani.

translation.en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
translation.ig: Stampụ ya nke otu puku bụ “Nnukwu Omume nke Ndị Eze Sweden” ahụ dị ebube nke David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl dere na 2000, nke edepụtara na Akwụkwọ Guiness nke Ndekọ Ụwa.

translation.en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
translation.ig: O sokwa na aru ego akwukwo mba di iche iche, otu oru oruru ohuru bu foto Onye isi goomenti Canada etinyeru n’ihu ego ohuru $5 na $100 ndi Canada.

translation.en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
translation.ig: Mgbe ihe mberde ahụ mechara, e buru Gibson gawa n’ụlọ ọgwụ mana ọ nwụrụ mgbe obere oge gachara.

translation.en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
translation.ig: Ọkwọ ụgbọ gwongworo ahụ, nke gbara afọ 64, emerụghị ahụ na mkpọka ahụ.

translation.en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
translation.ig: N'otu ụbọchị ahụ, ebe elekere nke iri na abụọwepụrụ ụgbọ ahụ n'ebe ihe mbere mere.

translation.en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
translation.ig: Otu onye na-arụ ọrụ ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala nọ n’akụkụ ebe ihe mberede ahụ mere kwuru si: "E nwere ụmụaka nọ na-eche ịgafe okporo ụzọ ahụ nakwa ha nille nọ na-eti mkpu ma na-ebe akwa."

translation.en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
translation.ig: Ha niile gbaghachitere azụ site na ebe ihe mberede okporo ụzọ ahụ mere.

translation.en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
translation.ig: Ihe ndi ozo akpara na Bali bu izoputa ohia ndi ozo di n’uwa na ikee nka n’uzu nwere ike inyere ndi mba n’ebilite aka itoo n’uzo ga-akwusi mmeto ikuku.

translation.en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
translation.ig: Ndi U.N. nwekwara olileanya iwepụta ego iji nyere mba niile aka ndị global wọmịn metụtara iji nagide nsogbu o butere.

translation.en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
translation.ig: Enwere ike iji ego agụ rụọ ụlọ ndị mmiri anaghi ebu, njikwa dọtị ka mma, na ọkụkụ ihe dị iche iche.

translation.en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
translation.ig: Fluke dere na mbo ufodu gbara ihu na emechiri onu umunwanyi iji kwusi ha ikwuputa okwu maka ihe gbasara ahuike umu nwanyi agaghi nkeoma.

translation.en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
translation.ig: O ruru na mkpebi a n'ihi ọtụtụ okwu nkwado o nwetara n'aka ụmụnwoke ma ụmụnwaanyị ndị sị ya na ọgwụ mgbochi afọ ime bụ ihe kwesịrị ekwesị.

translation.en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
translation.ig: Oge ya bụ ọgụ gwụchara mgbe e wegara ndị merụrụ ahụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ, ihe dị ka ndị mkpọrọ 40 fọrọ afọ nọọrọ na mpụga, jụ ịlaghachi n'ime ụlọ mkpọrọ ha.

translation.en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
translation.ig: Ndị mkparịta ụka nwara ịweta udo, mana ihe ndị mkpọrọ chọrọ edoghi anya.

translation.en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
translation.ig: N'etiti 10:00 na 11:00 MDT n'abalị, ndị mkpọrọ nọ na mpụta mụnyere ọkụ.

translation.en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
translation.ig: N'oge na-adịghị anya, ndị ọrụ uwe ojii ejikere na gịa ogbaaghara batara n'ime yad ahụ ma jiri gaasị anya mmiri wee gbakọta ndị mkpọrọ n’otu ebe.

translation.en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
translation.ig: Ndị otu mgbanyụ ọkụ mechara gbanyụọ ọkụ ahụ ebe 11:35 nke abalị.

translation.en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
translation.ig: Mgbe aruchara akwa-mmiri ahu na afo 1963, ewee kwusi udu idemiri ahu nke na agbasa unyi na ahu mmiri ahu nile.

translation.en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
translation.ig: Sedimenti a dị mkpa maka ịmepụta ụmụ mgbochi ejiri aja mee ma akụkụ osimiri, nke jere ozi dị ka ebe obibi anụ ọhịa.

translation.en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
translation.ig: N’ihi nke ahụ, ụdị azụ abụọ ekpochapụla, ma abụọ ndị ọzọ abụrụla ndị nọ n’ihe ize ndụ, gụnyere humpback chub.

translation.en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghi na larịị mmiri ahụ ga-eto elu ụkwụ ole na ole naanị mgbe idei mmiri ahụ gasịrị, ndị isi na-enwe olile anya na ọ ga-ezu iji weghachi ụmụ ugwu aja nke mmiri riri na ndịda ụzọ mmiri.

translation.en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
translation.ig: E nwebeghị ịdọ aka na ntị nke ajọ ebili mmiri enyegoro, ma na-ndabere na ụlọ ọrụ jiofiziz Jakarta ahụ, a gaghị adọ aka na ntị nke ajọ ebili mmiri n’ihi na ala ọma jijiji ahụ eruteghị iheachọrọ nke ịdị ukwuu 6.5.

translation.en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị na enweghị ihe n'egosi na a ga-enwe sunami, ndi bi ebe ahụ bidoro tụwa egwu, jiri ọsọ na-ahapụsị ụlọ na ahịa ha.

translation.en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghi na Winfrey bu anya mmiri n'okwu ije ọma ya, o mere ka ndị ihe ya na-amasị mata nke ọma na ọ ga-alọghachi.

translation.en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
translation.ig: “Nke a abụghị ịsị ka e mesịa. Nke a bụ imechi otu isi na imeghe nke ọhụrụ.”

translation.en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
translation.ig: Akara nchịkọta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị obodo egosila na ahọrọgharịrị onye isi obodo nọ n'ọchịchị bụ Hifikepunye Pohamba.

translation.en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
translation.ig: Otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị ugbu a, Sawụt West Afrịka Pịpụls Ọganaịzeshọn (SWAPO), jidekwara ọnọdụ ha dịka otu kacha n'ọnụ ọgụgụ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu.

translation.en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
translation.ig: Ndị mmekọta na ndị agha Afghan banyere n’ime ebe ahụ ichekwa saịtị ahụ ma ezitela ụgbọ elu ndị mmekọta inyere aka.

translation.en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
translation.ig: Mkpọkasị ahụ mere n'elu ugwu, e kwenyekwara na ọ bụ ya kpatara ajọ ọkụ.

translation.en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
translation.ig: Mgbalị ị na-achọ saịtị okuku ahụ na-emebi ihu igwe site na ihu igwe dị njọ na ala siri ike.

translation.en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ahụike Mangola, 'Medecines Sans Frontieres', na Wọld Helt Ọganaịzeshọn na-ekwụ na ọ bụ ntiwapụ ọrịa kachasị njọ ahụrụla na mba ahụ.

translation.en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
translation.ig: Onye nkwuchite maka Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman kwuru: "Angola na-agaru maka ntiwapụ ya kacha njọ mgbe ọ bụla ma ọnọdụ ahụ ka dịkwa njọ n’ime Angola,” o kwuru.

translation.en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
translation.ig: Egwuregwu ji ihu igwe dị mma bido ebe elekere iri nke ụtụtụ, ewepụ igirigi yọrọ n'ụtụtụ nke gbachara ọsịsọ, ọ bụ ụbọchị zuru oke nye 7's rugbi.

translation.en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
translation.ig: Ndi kachasị elu na asọmpi bu South Africa bidoro na akara nke oma mgbe ha nwere mmeri ntụsara ahụ nke 26 - 00 megide Zambia gbara mkpụrụ nke 5.

translation.en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghị na ọ dị ka ndị na emegide ha bụ ndị ndịda ka ha mma, ndị mba Sawụt Afrịka melitere nwayọ nwayọ ka ịsọ mpi gara n'ihu.

translation.en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
translation.ig: Ụzọ mkpachapụ anya ha n’ime mgbochi, ka ha si ejide bọọlụ ma ụzọ nhàzi pụrụ iche mere ha ka ha pụọ iche ma o doro ha anya n’òtù a bụ òtù ha ga-emeri.

translation.en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
translation.ig: Ndị ọrụ maka obodo nke Amstardam na Ebe ngosi ihe ndị mgbe ochie Anne Frank na-ekwu na osisi ahụ ebutela ọrịa n’iji ero ma dịkwa njọ makka ahụike ọha dịka ha na-agbagha na ọ nọbụrụ n’ezigbo ihe ize ndụ nke ịdapụga n’ofe.

translation.en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
translation.ig: Akara ya maka mgbututu n'ụbọchị Tuzde, mana azọpụtara ya ka ụlọ ikpe kpegharịrị ikpe na mberede.

translation.en: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
translation.ig: Ụzọ niile dị n'ọgba ahụ a kpọrọ “Ụmụnne nwanyị asaa” dị ihe dịka opekatampe 100 mita ruo mita 250 (fiiti 328 ruo 820) na dayamita.

translation.en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
translation.ig: Ụmụ onyinyo infràreèd na-egosipụta na mgbanwe okpomọkụ ahụ sitere n'ụbọchị na abalị na-egosi na ha nwere ike ịbụ ọgba.

translation.en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
translation.ig: Ha na-adị oyi karịa gburugburu ha n'ehihie ma dị ọkụ karịa n'abalị.

translation.en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
translation.ig: Omume okpomọkụ ha anaghị adịgide ka nnukwu ọgba dị n'ụwa nke na-enwe okpomọkụ na-anaghị agbanwe, mana ọ dị ka ndị a maka na ha bụkwa olulu miri emi n'ime ala," Glen Cushing kwuru, onye United States Geology Survey (USGS) Otu Astrojiọlọji na nke Mahadum Northern Arizona dị na Flagstaff, Arizona.

translation.en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
translation.ig: Na mba Frans, ịtụ ụtụ bụ ihe anaghị eji ike eme: ndị na-atụ ụtụ na ewezuga onwe ha n'otu ụlọ ndo, tinye akwụkwọ ebiri na ndịnihu nke na-egosi onye ha na atụrụ ụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ amachiri amachi.

translation.en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
translation.ig: Ka ndị nchịkọta nyochachara onye na-atụ ụtụ, onye na-atụ ụtụ etinye akwụkwọ ụtụ ya amachiri amachi n'ime igbe nnakọ ụtụ ma bie aka n'akwụkwọ ndị tụrụ ụtụ.

translation.en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
translation.ig: Iwu gbasara ntuliaka na Frans depụtara usoro ikpe kpọmkwem.

translation.en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
translation.ig: Kemgbe 1988, ụmụ igbe ntuli aka ga-abụrịrị ngafe-ahụ-ụzọ ka ndị ntụli aka na ndị nnyota ga-agba akaebe na o nweghị envelopu nọ na ya mgbe a na-ebido ntuli aka nakwa o nweghị envelopu etinyere ewezụga nke ndị agụgwere ọnụ ma nye ikikere nke ọma.

translation.en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
translation.ig: Ndị a na atụrụ ụtụ nwere ike iziga ndị nnọchiteanya ka ha gbaa ama ihe nile mere. Na mgbede, ndị ọrụ efu ga agụkọ ụtụ nile na oke nlegideanya , ma site n'usoro atọrọ atọ.

translation.en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
translation.ig: ASUS Eee PC, ewepụtara ụwa niile na mbụ maka ụmụ ihe nchekwa-ego na arụmọrụ ya, wụrụ isiokwu na-ewu ewu n’Ọnwa IT Taipei 2007.

translation.en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
translation.ig: Mana ogugo ahịa kọmpụta laptop ga-agbanwe ma dị iche ri nne ka ASUS nwetachara Nturu ugo Taịwan Sọstenebụl Awọdụ n'afọ 2007 site n'aka Ezekutiv Yuan si na Repọblik Chaịna.

translation.en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
translation.ig: Webụsaịtị steshọn a kpọrọ ihe ngosi a "ihe ngosi redio ndị mgbe ochie nke osote ya ọhụrụ gbasara ịgba ara akwụkwọ ma dị egwu!"

translation.en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
translation.ig: N’oge mbu ya, ihe ngosi a ka egosiputara n’igwe saịtị intaneti na-agba ọsọ nke TogiNet Radio, ebe a lekwasịrị anya na redio na-ekwu okwu.

translation.en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
translation.ig: N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 2015, TogiNet bidoro AstroNet Redio dị ka mpaghara nọ n'okpuru ya.

translation.en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
translation.ig: Na mbụ, ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara ndị omee olu ka bidoro ebido, ndị si n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Tegzas.

translation.en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
translation.ig: A sị na ozuzu ohi gara n'ihu ogologo abalị niile, n'ihi na ndị ọrụ mmanye iwu anọghị n'okporo ama Bishkek.

translation.en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
translation.ig: Otu onye nkere anya kọwapụtara Bishkek dịka ihe na-emikpu n'ọnọdụ "ọgba aghara", ka ndị mmadụ na akpagharị na eburughara ngwa ahịa n'ike.

translation.en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
translation.ig: Otutu ndi bi na Bishkek tara ndi na-eme ngaghari iwe si na odida anyanwu uta gbasara imebi iwu

translation.en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
translation.ig: Mba Sawụtụ Afrịka emeriela Ọl Bụlaksị (Nuu Ziilandị) n'egwuregwu rọgụbi nke Mbanaatọ n'ama egwuregwu Royal Bafokeng nke dị na Rọstenbọgụ, Sawụtụ Afrịka.

translation.en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
translation.ig: N'ikpeazụ, otu ọkpụ ka ha jiri merie ha, ha sara ọkpụ iri abụọ na otu ebe ndị mmegide ha sara ọkpụ iri abụọ. Nke a usoro mmeri iri na ise ndị Ọl Blaks na mmechi.

translation.en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
translation.ig: Maka òtù Springboks ndị ahụ, ọ kwụsịrị na egwuregwu-ise nke ogologo usoro ọdịda.

translation.en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ ịsọmpi ikpeazụ nke Ọl Blaks ndị merigoro ihe nnweta izu ụka abụọ gara aga.

translation.en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
translation.ig: A ga-agba egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke ogbe a n'Elis Pak na Johanesbọg n'izu na-abịa abịa, mgbe ndị Sprịngbọks ga-agba Ọstrelia.

translation.en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
translation.ig: Ala ọma jijiji dị larịị mara ọdịda anyanwụ Montana jijiji mgba ojiri nkeji asatọ gafee elekere nke iri n'abalị Monde.

translation.en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
translation.ig: Mpaghara mba Yunaịted Steeti na-ahụ maka mmegharị ala (USGS) na mpaghara nke na-ezite ozi gbasara ala ọma jijiji enwetabeghị mkpesa ihe mmebi.

translation.en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
translation.ig: Ala ọma jijiji ahụ nwere etiti ya na ihe dị ka km 20 (maịlị 15) ugwu-ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụnke Dillon, na ihe dị ka km 65 (maịlị 40) ndịda nke Butte.

translation.en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
translation.ig: N'ụbọchị Mọnde, n'ala mpịtọ dị Lyon nso nke dị n'ọwụwa anyanwụ mba Frans, ka achọpụtara na ọrịa gburu otu ọbọgwụ bụ ụdịrị ọrịa nnụnụ nke nwere ike igbu mmadụ, bụ H5N1.

translation.en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
translation.ig: Frans bụ mba nke asaa n'ọgbakọ Iroopu ịta ahụhụ n'ihi ọrịa a; osotere Ọstrịa, Jemani, Slovenia, Bọlgeria, Gris na Itali.

translation.en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
translation.ig: Enwere orịa a ka na-enyo enyo ka ọ bụ H5N1na mba Kroeshia na Denmak.

translation.en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
translation.ig: Chambers gbara Chukwu akwụkwọ maka "ọnwụ zuru ebe niile, mmebi na iyi egwu eyiri nde ka nde mmadụ bi n’ụwa."

translation.en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
translation.ig: Chambers, onye na-ajụkarị oge niile, na-agbagha na ikpe ya "abaghị uru" ma "onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịkụ onye ọbụla ikpe."

translation.en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
translation.ig: Akụkọ egosipụtara na opera french, nke Camille Saint-Saens dere, bụ maka onye na-ese ihe "nke ịhụnanya o nwere maka Japan na ọgwụ ike na-achị ndụ ya."

translation.en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
translation.ig: N'ihi nke a ndị na-eme ihe ngosi na-ese igbo n'ebe ngosi ihe, ndị nwe ụlọ ngosi ihe na-akwadokwa ndị nlere anya ka ha sonye.

translation.en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
translation.ig: Onye na-ekwubu okwu n'ụlọ omeiwu bụ Newt Gingrich, onye isi obodo Tekzas bụ Rik Perị, na onye otu nzukọ omeiwu Mishel Bakmann mechara gba ndị anọ, ise na isii, n'usoro.

translation.en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
translation.ig: Ka akara omume pụtara, Gingrich kelere Santorum, mana ọ gwara Rọmni okwu ike, n'ihi ụdịrị mkpọsa ozi ọ kpọsara megide Gringrich na Ayowa.

translation.en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
translation.ig: Perry kwuru na ọ ga "agaghachị Tekzas ileba anya n'akara omume abalị a, ịchọpụta ma o nwere ọganihu n'ọsọ ahụ", ma na omechara kwuo na ọ ga anọgide n'ọsọ ma sọọ mpi izizi na Karolaina n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Jenụwarị.

translation.en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
translation.ig: Bakman, onye meriri Ntuliaka Ames Strọ n'Ọgọọst, kpebiri ịkwụsị kampen ya.

translation.en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
translation.ig: E bugara onye ahụ na-ese fòto na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Reagan UCLA, ebe o mechara nwụọ.

translation.en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
translation.ig: A kọbụrụ na ọ nọ n’ime ụmụ afọiri abụọ ya. N’otu nkwupụta, Bieber siri "Agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị ma ọ sonyeghị ozugbo ọdachi ihe mberede okporo ụzọ a, echiche na ekpere m nonyere ezinụlọ ndị onye a tara ahụhụ."

translation.en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
translation.ig: Webụsaịtị akụkọ ntụrụndụ TMZ ghọtara onye na-ese fòto ahụ kwụsịrị ụgbọala ya n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke okporo ámá Sepulveda sara mbara nwere ụmụ osisi akwụwara n'akụkụ ya ma nwaa ị see fòto nkwụsị ndị uwe ojii tupu ya agafee okporo ụzọ wee gaa n'ihu, na-akpali onye uwe ojii Njeghari ilekota Nnukwu okporo ụzọ anya nke California na-eduzi okporo ụzọ iji nyeghachi ya iwu gafeghachị , ugboro abụọ.

translation.en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
translation.ig: Dị ka ndị uwe ojii kwuru, ọkwụ ụgbọ ala ahụ suru onye na-ese fòto eleghị anya ọ gaghị enwe ebubo mpụ ọ bụla.

translation.en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
translation.ig: Ya na naanị medaal iri na asatọ dị kwa otu ụbọchị, ọtụtụ mba adala imepụta ikpo okwu medaal ahụ.

translation.en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
translation.ig: Ha gụnyere mba Nedalands, ebe Anna Jochemsen gbara onye nke itoolu n'egwuregwu nkwụmọtọ ụmụ nwanyị nke asọmpi Super-G ụnyaahụ, na Fịnland ebe Katja Saarinen gbara onye nke iri n'otu egwuregwu ahụ.

translation.en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.ig: Michel Gọrli gbachara Super-G nkwụmọtọ ụmụ nwoke dịka onye nke iri na otu. Oldrich Jelinek, onye Chek rịpọblik gbara onye nke iri na isii na Super-G ọnụnọ ala ụmụ nwoke.

translation.en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
translation.ig: Arly Velaskwez, onye Megziko, gbara onye nke iri na ise na Supa-G ịnọ ọdụ nke ụmụ nwoke. Adam Họl, onye Niu Ziland, gbara onye nke itoolu na Supa-G nkwụmọtọ ụmụ nwoke.

translation.en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.ig: Onye Poland kpuri isi bụ Maciej Krezel na-egwu egwuregwu ski, na onye ndu ya Anna Ogarzynska mechara onye nke iri na atọ na asọm mpi Supa-G. Jong Seork Park onye South Korea mechara onye nke iri abụọ na ano na asọm mpi ụmụnwoke Super-G.

translation.en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
translation.ig: Ndị nchekwa udo UN, ndị lọtara n’ime Haịti mgbe ala ọma jijiji 2010 gachara, bụ ndị a na-ata ụta maka nkesa ọrịa ahụ nke malitere n’akụkụ kampụ ndị agha ahụ.

translation.en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
translation.ig: Na-ndabere n’ikpe ahụ, ehichaghị ọfụma mkpofu si na kampụ UN, nke na-akpata nje ịbanye nna nwaghara ụzọ nke osimiri Artibonite, otu n’ime nke Haịti kachasị ibu.

translation.en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
translation.ig: Tupu ndị agha abịarute, Haiti ezutebeghị nsogbu ndị metụtara ọrịa ahụ kemgbe oge ndị 1800.

translation.en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
translation.ig: Ụlọọrụ ikpe na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Haiti atụjela aka n'ọmụmụ sị na ndị agha udo UN nke Nepal bubatara ọrịa na Nepal n'amaghị ama.

translation.en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
translation.ig: Danielle Lantagne, otu onye ọkachamara UN n’ọrịa ahụ, kwuru na ntiwapụ ahụ bụ ndị na-eme ụdọ nwere ike ịkpata ya.

translation.en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
translation.ig: Hamilton kwetere na Ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum Howard nabatara onye ọrịa ahụ n’ọnọdụ ahụ kwụsiri ike

translation.en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
translation.ig: Onye ọrịa ahụ agabuola na Naịjirịa, ebe a na-enwela ụfọdụ ndị bu nje Ebola ahụ.

translation.en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ esorola ìwuùsòrò maka njikwa ọrịa ofufe, gụnyere iwepụta iche onye ọrịa ahụ site na ndị ọzọ iji gbochie mbufe ndị ọzọ ọrịa nwere ike ime.

translation.en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
translation.ig: Tupu Simpsons Simon Ahụ arụọla ọrụ n’ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n’ọkwa dị iche iche.

translation.en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
translation.ig: N'afọ ndị 1980, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe ngosi dị ka Tagzi, Cheers, ya na ihe ngosi Tresi Ullman.

translation.en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
translation.ig: Na 1989 ọ nyere aka na mmepụta The Simpsons ya na Brooks na Groening, ọ bụ ya hụrụ maka ịwe ndị otu edemede mbụ nke ihe nkiri a.

translation.en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghi na ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi a n'afọ 1993, ọ ka jidere ọkwa onye isi mmepụta ya, gaa n'ihu na-anara ọtụtụ nde dọla iri kwa sizin n'ụgwọ royalti.

translation.en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ndị Chaịna n’oge mbụ kọrọ maka ụgbọ elu a chọrọ izuru.

translation.en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
translation.ig: Ozi ndị ọzọ mechara bata kwuru na ụgbọ elu ahụ natara iyi ụjọ gbasara ogbunigwe ya mere o ji wee lọghachi Afganistan, lotuo na Kandahar.

translation.en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
translation.ig: Mkpesa mbụ kwuru na achụghachiri ụgbọelu ahụ azụ gawa Afghanistan mgbe anapụrụ ya ikikere ịfedà na mberede n’Ürümqi.

translation.en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
translation.ig: Ihe mberede ụgbọ elu, na-eme ọtụtụ mgbe na mba Aịran, nke nwere ụgbọ elu ndị agha na ndị nkịtị kara nka nke anaghị eleọkọta anya nke ọma.

translation.en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
translation.ig: Ntarama-ahuhu nke mba uwa putara na agaghi azutali ugbo-elu ohuru.

translation.en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
translation.ig: Na mbido izu a, helịkọpta ndị uwe ojii kpọkasịrị gbuo mmadụ atọ ma merụọ mmadụ atọ ọzọ ahụ.

translation.en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
translation.ig: N’ọnwa gara aga Iran hụrụ ihe ọdachi ikuku ya kachasị njọ n’ọtụtụ afọ mgbe otu ụgbọ elu na-aga Amenịa kpọkara, na-egbu ndị 168 nọ n’ime ya.

translation.en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
translation.ig: N'otu ọnwa ahụ ka ụgbọ elu ọzọ na Mashhad si n'ụzọ ya gbapụ sụnye isi na mgbidi, were gbuo mmadụ iri na asaa.

translation.en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
translation.ig: Erosmit akagbuola ihe ngosi ha fọdụrụ na njem ha.

translation.en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
translation.ig: Bandị rọk ahụ tozuru oke ịga njem nleta na United States na Kanada ruo Septemba 16.

translation.en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
translation.ig: Ha kagburu njem ngagharị ahụ mgbe onye isi ịgụ egwu Steven Tyler merụrụ ahụ mgbe ọ si n’ebedielu dapụ dị ka ọ na eme emume ngosi na Ọgọst 5.

translation.en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
translation.ig: Emeriri Murray na seti nke mbu na ndorondoro njirimara onye mmeri mgbe umu nwoke abuo jidere bolu ọ bụla n’ime setị.

translation.en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
translation.ig: Del Potro nwere uru dị oge na seetị nke abụọ, mana nke a kwa chọrọ ịchọpụta onye mmeri mgbe eruchara 6-6.

translation.en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
translation.ig: Potro natara nlekota na ubu ya n’oge a mana were ike laghachi azu n’egwuregwu ahu.

translation.en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
translation.ig: Ihe omume bidoro n’elekere 8:30 nke ụtụtụ. oge mpaghara (15.00 UTC).

translation.en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
translation.ig: Ndị ọgụ egwu ama ama n’obodo niile bụkuru bhajan, maọbụ abụ ofufe, nye ụkwụ Shri Shyam.

translation.en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.ig: Onye ọgụ egwu Sanju Sharma bidoro na mgbede, Jai Shankar Choudhary were sote ya. Ọ gụkwara chhappan bhog bhajan. Onye ọgụ egwu Raju Khandelwal sonyekwara ya.

translation.en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
translation.ig: Lakkha Singh wee bido idu n'ịbụ abụ bajan gasị.

translation.en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
translation.ig: Efere 108 nke Chhappan Bhog (na okpukpe Hindu, ihe erimeri 56 dị iche iche, dị ka, swiiti, mkpụrụ osisi, akị, nri dị iche iche wdg. Nke e ji achụrụ chi aja) ka e ji wee nye Baba Sham onyinye.

translation.en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.ig: Lakkha Singh gosirikwara chhappan bhog bhajan. Oguegwu, Raju Khandelwal nọ na-esonye ya.

translation.en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
translation.ig: Na nguputa isi okwu ubochi Tozdee maka Ihe ngosi Egwuregwu Tokyo, onye isi Nintendo Satoru Iwata kpughere controller design ulo oru ya maka njikwa ohuru Nintendo Revolution.

translation.en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
translation.ig: Ngwa Kọntrola, nke yiri rimotu onyonyo, na-eji ihe mmetụta abụọ dị n'akụkụ onyonyo achọpụta ọnọdụ ya n'oghere ọbụla nwere akụkụ atọ.

translation.en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
translation.ig: Nke a ga-ekwe ka ndị na-egwu egwuregwu jikwaa ihe omume na njegharị n'egwuregwu vidiyo site na imegharị ngwa ọrụ ahụ n'ikuku.

translation.en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
translation.ig: Giancarlo Fisichella ejikwalighi ụgbọ ala ya wee si n'ọsọ ahụ pụọ n'isi mmalite ya.

translation.en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
translation.ig: Onye otu ya Fenando Alonso nọ n'isi ọsọ ọtụtụ mgbe, mana nke ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ụgbọala ya, o nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ụkwụ ihu ụgbọala a na-etinyeghi nke ọma.

translation.en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
translation.ig: Michael Schumacher kwụsịrị ọsọ ya n’oge na-etoghị anya mgbe Alonso mesịrị, n’ihi mmebi sọspenshọn n’ime ọtụtụ agha n’ime oge ọsọ ahụ.

translation.en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
translation.ig: Dịka edemede nzukọ nta akụkọ ahụ kwuru, "ọ sị na ọ mara oke mma ma mara ka esi agụ egwu ọfụma".

translation.en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
translation.ig: Ọ metụtara m n'ala ala obi m mgbe ọbụla anyị mere mmegharị nkwado maka nke a.

translation.en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
translation.ig: K’oforo nkeji 3 ka ha fenyie, igwefoto no n’ime ugbo ahu gosirika otutu foam n’ekpuchi ihe kewapuru na tanki mmanu.

translation.en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
translation.ig: N’agbanyegghị, echeghị na ha kpatara mmebi ọ bụla n’ụgbọ njem ahụ.

translation.en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
translation.ig: Onye isi ihe mmemme shọtụl NASA bụ Wayne Hale Jr. kwuru na fom ahụ dara "mgbe oge anyị na-ele anya gasịrị."

translation.en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
translation.ig: Ka nkeji ise gachara e bidoro ihe ngosi a, ikuku ebido kuwe, ka nkeji ọzọ gachara, ikuku a na-eru ọsọ kilomita 70 kwa awa... mmiri ebido zowe, mana o ji iwe bịa, ụdịrị iwe na-eme ka ọ na-adụ gị adụ ka ntu, mkpụrụ mmiri ebido zowe, ndị mmadụ a na-agbagharị, na-atụ egwu, na-eti mkpu.

translation.en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
translation.ig: Nwanne m nwanyị na enyi ya nwụrụ, na dịka m na-aga n'ụzọ, enwere ndị mmadụ abụọ nwere nkwarụ, ndị mmadụ a na-arị ha elu, na-akwagharị ha," Amand Vesachi kwuru.

translation.en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
translation.ig: NHK kwukwara na ulo oru nuklia power plant nke Kashiwazaki Kariwa di na mpaghara Niigata n’aru oru ofuma.

translation.en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
translation.ig: Hokuriku Electrik Pawa Co. zitere ozi na ala ọma jijiji emebighi ihe n'igwe ọkụ nke izizi na nke abụọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ike nuklia dị na Shika nke emechiri emechi.

translation.en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
translation.ig: A kọrọ na ụfọdụ ebeobibi dị 9400 na mpaghara ahụ nọ na-enweghị mmiri ma ihe dị ka 100 na-enweghị ọkụ eletriki.

translation.en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
translation.ig: O mebiri ụfọdụ ụzọ, kwụsịtụ njem ụgbọ oloko n'ebe ndị o metụtara, ma ọdụ ụgbọelu Ishikawa ka mechiri emechi.

translation.en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
translation.ig: Otu ogbunigwe gbawara n'ezi ụlọ ọrụ onye isi ọchịchị.

translation.en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
translation.ig: Ogbunigwe atọ ọzọ gbara na nsonso ụlọ gọọmenti gasị n'ime awa abụọ.

translation.en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
translation.ig: Akụkọ ụfọdụ sịrị na mmadụ asatọ nwụrụ, ma akụkọ gọọmenti sị na ihe ruru mmadụ iri atọ merụrụ ahụ; ma na amatabeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ ikpeazụ.

translation.en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
translation.ig: A chọpụtara ma sayanọriki asidi ma melamini na mamịrị anụụlọ ndị nwụrụ ka ha richara nri anụụlọ merụrụ emerụ.

translation.en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
translation.ig: Ndị nchọpụta na mahadum sị na ihe ndị a na-emekorịta imepụta mkpụrụ nwere ike ịkwụsị ọrụ akụrụ.

translation.en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
translation.ig: Ndị nnyocha ahụ chọpụtara na ọ kpụrụ okwute mgbe e tinyere melamin na siyanurik asid n'ime amịrị buusu.

translation.en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
translation.ig: Ngwakọta nke kristal ndị a dị ka ndị a hụrụ n'amịrị ụmụ anụmanụ ụlọ ndị emetụtara, ma e jiri infrared spektroskopi (FTIR) lee ya.

translation.en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
translation.ig: Amaghị m ma Ị matara nke a ma ọ dịghị, mana ọtụtụ ngwaahịa si Sentral Amerịka batara n'obodo a n'akwụghị ụgwọ mbubata.

translation.en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
translation.ig: Ma a nara ụtụ isi pasentị iri asatọ na ngwaahịa anyị site na ụmụ tarifu na mba Keetiti Amerịka. anyị na-eleta gị anya.

translation.en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
translation.ig: Ọ dịghị m n'anya ka ihe kwesịrị ekwesị; ọ bụghị ezi ihe n'ezie.

translation.en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
translation.ig: Naanị ihe m na-agwa ndị mmadụ bụ na gị meso anyị etu anyị si emeso gị.

translation.en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
translation.ig: Gọvanọ California Arnold Schwarzenegger tiri iwu nke machibidoro iresi ụmụaka maọbụ ịgbazinye ha egwuregwu vidio ihe ike.

translation.en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
translation.ig: Iwu ahụ chọrọ ka egwuregwu vidio ime ihe ike ndị e rere na steeti California ka a mapanye mmewe na-agụpụta "18" na ha ma mere ka ntaramahụhụ maka orire ha nye nwata bụrụ $1000 kwa ịda iwu.

translation.en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
translation.ig: Onye nchịkwa Amamikpe n'ihu ọha, Kier Stama QC, kwuru okwu n'ụtụtụ a ikwusa amamikpe Huhne na Pryce.

translation.en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
translation.ig: Huhne agbaala arukwaghi ma onye ga anochi ya na otu ndi oso-eze achi bu Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP ka ana atu-anya ka owere oru onye ozi azumahia Davey na apu-apu.

translation.en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
translation.ig: Ahazirioge Huhne na Pryce ibia n’ihu oka ikpe n’ulo ikpe nke Westiminster Magistrates Court ubochi onwa Februari ga di na 16.

translation.en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
translation.ig: Ndị nwụrụ na ya bụ Nicholas Alden, dị afọ 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, dị afọ 21. Cuddeback bụ ya nọ na-anya ụgbọ.
