translation.ig: Ụfọdụ ebe mgbakọ na-enye ụmụ ihe ọn̄ụn̄ụ na-eme n'anya n'efu. Mana, mmanya ogbugbu na-egbochi echiche, ma ndị nille na-agba chaa chaa nke ọma mara mkpa nke ọ dị ịnọ n'ezi echiche.

translation.en: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
translation.ig: Onye ọ bụla nke na-aga ịnya ụgbọ ala ya elu latitude maọbụ n’elu ugwu gafere, kwesịrị ịtụle ihe enwere ike ịbụ oge snow, ice, ma ọ bụ oke oyi.

translation.en: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
translation.ig: N’okporo ụzọ ebe ais na sno dị, nrapara dị ala nakwa ịnweghị ike ịnya moto n'elu ya dịka ị nọ na asfalt nkịtị.

translation.en: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
translation.ig: N'oge ụmụ oke ozuzo okwute mmiri, sinoo ga-ezu iji mee ka ị tọọ nwere ike izo n'ime ntakịrị oge.

translation.en: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.
translation.ig: Enwere ike igbochi mgbàràìhè site na ịda ma ọ bụ ịfụ sinoo ma ọ bụ site na umu irighiri mmiri ma ọ bụ mmiri kpụkọrọ akpụkọ na windo ụgbọala.

translation.en: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
translation.ig: N'aka nke ọzọ, ụmụ ọnọdụ okwute mmiri na sinoo bụ ihe nkịtị n'ọtụtụ mba, ma ụmụ ụgbọala na-anyagharị n'enweghị nsogbu afọ niile.

translation.en: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
translation.ig: Safari nwere ike ịbụ ihe kachasị akpọta ndị njem nlereanya na Afrịka ma bụrụkwa ihe kachasị atụ ha n'anya.

translation.en: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
translation.ig: Okwu bụ safari n’ojiji ama ama pụtara ime njem n’ofe ala ileleanụ ọhịa Afrịka dị ịtụnanya, tụnadị na savanna.

translation.en: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
translation.ig: Ụmụanụmanụ ụfọdụ, dịka enyi ga na mgbara ga, na-abịaru nso n’ụgbọala ma ngwaọrụ izugbe dị mma ga-enye gị ohere iji hụ ha nke ọma.

translation.en: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
translation.ig: Ọdụm, agụogbu na agụ na-eme ihere mgbe ụfọdụ ma ị ga-ahụ na nke ọma karịa n'iji baịnokụlaasị.

translation.en: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
translation.ig: Safari ngagharị (nke a na-akpọkwa "njem ọhịa", "safari ọrịrị", maọbụ "nzọụkwụ") gbakwunyere ịrị ugwu ruo awa ole na ole maọbụ ọtụtụ ụbọchị.

translation.en: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
translation.ig: Engwuregwu Paralimpiks ga-eme site n'Ọgọọst 24 ruo na Septemba 5 2021. A ga-eme ụfọdụ emume n'ebe ndị ọzọ gburugburu Japan.

translation.en: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
translation.ig: Tokyo ga-abụ naanị obodo Eshia nke kwadoro asọmpi nke oge okpomọkụ ugboro abụọ, ebe akwadoro egwuregwu ahụ na 1964.

translation.en: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụrụ ụgwọ maka ụgbọelu gị na ebe obibi gị maka 2020 tupu ekwuputa myigharịrị oge, i nwere ike inwe ọnọdụ tara akpụ.

translation.en: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
translation.ig: Iwu nkagbu na-adị iche iche, mana ka ọ dị na Maachị gara aga ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ iwu nkagbu dabere na njecorona agbatịghị ruo Julaị 2020, mgbe ahazirioge Olumpiks ahụ.

translation.en: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ ihe atụwara anya ya na ọtụtụ tiketị emume ga-adị ọnụ n'etiti ¥2,500 na ¥130,000, ya na tiketị a na-ahụkarị na-adị ọnụ ruo ihe dị ka ¥7,000.

translation.en: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
translation.ig: Ide akwa butụ mmiri nwere ike inyere ha aka ịkọ. Ọtụtụ ụlọ nkwarị akụ nwere otu igwe ndetị akwa na bọọdụ ide akwa dị adị maka mgbaziri, ọbụlagodi ma otu anọghị anọ n'ime ụlọ ahụ.

translation.en: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na igwe ndetị akwa adịghị adị, ma ọ bụ ọ bụrụ na ọ masịghị gị iyi sọks edere ede, mgbe ahụ ị nwere ike ịnwa iji otu igwe ịkọ ntutu, ma ọ dịrị.

translation.en: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
translation.ig: Kpachara anya ka akwa ghara ịdị oke ọkụ (nke a nwere ike ime ka akwa hịkpọọ, maọbụ ọ ka njọ, o nwere ike ịgba ọkụ).

translation.en: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
translation.ig: E nwere ọtụtụ ụzọ e ji eme ka mmiri dị ọcha, ụfọdụ kara dị ire maka ụmụ ihe iyi egwu pụrụ iche.

translation.en: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
translation.ig: N'ebe ụfọdụ isi mmiri n'ọkụ ruo otu nkeji ezuola, n'ebe ndị ọzọ achọrọ ọtụtụ nkeji.

translation.en: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
translation.ig: Ụmụ m̀yọ̀ na-adị iche n’ịdị irè, ma ọ bụrụ na ị nwee nchebara echiche, mgbe ahụ ị kwesịrị itule uche ịzụ mmiri gị n’ime otu karama amachiri siye na otu ụlọ ọrụ nwere aha ọma.

translation.en: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
translation.ig: Ndị njem nwere ike ịhụta ụmụ anụ ọtapịa ndị nke ha na-amaghị n'ebe ụlọ ha.

translation.en: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
translation.ig: Pesti nwere ike imebi nri, kpata Pests can spoil food, cause mmeka ahụ, ma ọ bụ n’ọnọdụ ka njọ kpata mmeghachi omume nfụkasị, kesaa venọm, ma ọ bụ ọrịa ofufe.

translation.en: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
translation.ig: Ụmụ ọrịa na-efe efe n’onwe ha, ma ọ bụ ụmụ anụmanụ dị egwu nwere ike imerụ ma ọ bụ gbuo mmadụ n’ike, a na-ghị etozukarị oke dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ a na-achọghị.

translation.en: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
translation.ig: Azụmaahịa na-enweghị ụtụ isi bụ ohere ịzụ ngwaahịa ndị ewezụgara site na ụtụ isi n’ụgwọ ndị ọzọ n’ebe ụfọdụ.

translation.en: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
translation.ig: Ndị njem na-aga mba ndị nwere nnukwu ụtụ isi nwere ike mgbe ụfọdụ ichekwa ọkpụrụkpụrụ ego, tụmadị na ngwaahịa dị ka ụmụ ihe ọn̄ụn̄ụ ndị na-aba n'anya na ụtaba.

translation.en: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
translation.ig: Mgbatị ụzọ nọ n'etiti Point Marion na Fairmont na-enye ọnọdụ ịnya ụgbọala kachasị taa akpụ n'Okporoụzọ Buffalo-Pittsburg, na-agafe ọtụtụ oge site n'ọdịdịala azụ ọhịa dịpụrụ adịpụ.

translation.en: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
translation.ig: Oburu na imaatachabeghi ka esi anya ugboala n’okporouzo ime obodo, ume ahapukwala gi: uzo n’akpode akpode, uzo di wara wara na nkuku nko juru eju.

translation.en: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
translation.ig: Ókè ekwomọsọ ebipụtara dị obere karịa n'ụzọ ahụrụ anya na ngalaba ndị ọzọ gara aga ma ndị na-abịa abịa - na-abụkarị mph 35-40 (km/h 56-64) - ma nrubeisi siri ike na ha kara dị mkpa karịa otu ọzọ.

translation.en: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
translation.ig: Na mmata ihe, n'agbanyeghị, ọrụ ekwentị mkpààgagharị ka dị ike ebe a karịa ọtụtụ ogologo ụzọ ndị ọzọ ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ Ọhịa Pennsylvania ahụ.

translation.en: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
translation.ig: Pastrị ndị Jamini dị nnọọ mma; na Bavaria, ọ na-enwe ọtụtụ ihe ma dịkwa iche iche ka nke ndị Ọstrịa, agbata obi ha n'akụkụ ndịda.

translation.en: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
translation.ig: A na-ahụkarị ụmụ achịcha mkpụrụ osisi, e ji apụl eme achịcha mgbe niile n'afọ, ejikwa cheri na plọm eme achịcha n'oge sọma.

translation.en: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ ngwaahịa achịcha eghere eghe na Jamanị na-egosipụtakwa njirimara ụmụ alịmọndụ, hezelnọt, na mkpụrụ osisi ndị ọzọ. Achịcha ndị ama ama na-agakarị nke ọma ya na otu iko nke kọfị siri ike.

translation.en: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ụmụ achịcha ndị pere mpe ma baakwa ụba, nwaa ihe na-ndabere na mpaghara a na-akpọ Berliner, Pfannkuchen ma ọ bụ Krapfen.

translation.en: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
translation.ig: Curry bu nri eji ngwa nri nke di iche iche esi, ana etinyekwa ya anu ma o bu akwukwo nri.

translation.en: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
translation.ig: Kọrị nwere ike ịdị "akọrọ" maọbụ dị "mmiri mmiri", ọ dabeere na mmiri dị adị.

translation.en: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
translation.ig: Ụmụ mpaghara imeala nke Ebe Ugwu Indịa na Pakistan, a na-ejikarị yogọọt n'ime ụmụ kọrị; n'ime Ebe Ndịda Indịa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ dị n'akụkụ mmiri nke okpuru kọntinent ahụ, a na-ejikarị mmiri ara akị oyibo.

translation.en: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
translation.ig: Ebe enwere agwaetiti 17,000 isi wee họrọ, nri Indonesia bụ aha gburugburu nke a na-akpọ ọtụtụ erimeri nke ọtụtụ mpaghara dị na mba ahụ niile.

translation.en: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
translation.ig: Mana, e kwuo ya n'etinyeghi nkọwa ọbụla, ihe a na-achọkarị ikwu bụ nri ahụ si n'etiti na ọwụwa anyanwu nke nnukwu agwaetiti Java.

translation.en: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
translation.ig: Ugbu a ọ dị adị nke ukwuu na gburugburu òtù ụmụ agwaetiti ndị ahụ, nri Ndị Java nwere njirimara nri ndị etijuru ngwa nri na mfe n’usoro, ekpomeekpo ahụ kara dị ike Ndị Java kara nwee mmasị na ya ndị nke bụ ahụekere achịcha kpuchiri, ose, shuga (tụmadị shuga akị Ndị Java) na ngwa nrị ndị ọzọ nwere usi ọma.

translation.en: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
translation.ig: Ihe nkonye ụkwụ bụ ihe na-ejide ụkwụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya nke na-awụdata n'akụkụ abụọ site oche elu ịnyịnya.

translation.en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
translation.ig: Ha na-ewetara onye na-agba ha nnukwu nnọsi ike mana ha nwere ike inwe nsogbu nchekwa maka na ụkwụ onye na-agba ya pụrụ ịkpachi n'ime ha.

translation.en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na esị n'elu ịnyịnya tụpụ onye na-anya ya mana ụkwụ onye ahụ ekonye n'ekike ịnyịnya, ịnyịnya nwere ike ịsekpụrụ ya na-aga ma ọ gbaa ọsọ. Iji belata ihe egwu a, enwere ụfọdụ ihe mkpachapụ anya enwere ike ime.

translation.en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
translation.ig: Na mbụ, ọtụtụ n’ime ndị na-anya na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ ọnyịnya ndị nwere kọị kọị na okpuru dị nrọ ma pee mpe.

translation.en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
translation.ig: Ọzọ, ụfọdụ sadụl, ọkachasị sadụl Bekee, nwere ebe nchekwa na-ekwe ka akpụkpọ anụ si na sadụl dapụ ma onye na-anya anya sere ya laa azụ mgbe ọ na-ada.

translation.en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
translation.ig: Ndagwurugwuru Cochamó - ebe arimelu nwere ogo kachasị elu nke Chile, a mara dị ka Yosemite nke Ndịda Amerịka, ya na ụdị dị iche iche nke ụmụ nnukwu ahụaja kọnkịrị na nnukwu nkume.

translation.en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
translation.ig: Ụmụ ọnụ ugwu kachasị elu gụnyere nlenle ndị magburu onwe ha site n'elu ebe ndị ahụ. Ndị na-arị elu si n'akụkụ ụwa niile na-awapụta mgbe niile ụzọ ọhụrụ site n'ahụaja ya niile e nwere ike isi wapụta ụzọ nke anaghị agwụ agwụ.

translation.en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
translation.ig: Kpoda-ugwu egwuregwu-snow, bu nke gunyere igba igwe mmiri ski na snowboard, bu egwuregwu amaara-amaara nke gbasara ikpoda ala site n’elu n’ogige juputara na snow jiri igwe ski na snowboard eyigidere n’ukwu gi.

translation.en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
translation.ig: Egwuregwu skii bụ otu isi ihe omume n'etiti ndị ọ na-amasị, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-amara ya dị ka "ski bums," na-eme atụmatụ nke oge ezumike niile gburugburu ime skii n'otu ebe kpọmkwem.

translation.en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
translation.ig: Egwuregwu ski eteela ọ nọ — ụmụ eserese esere n'ọgba kemgbe 5000 BC na-egosi ndị egwuregwu ski!

translation.en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
translation.ig: Igwu skii na mgbada ugwu dị ka otu egwuregwu gara azụ ruo opekata mpe ọ bụrụ na arị afọ iri na asaa, ma n’ime 1861 òtù egwuregwu skii ntụrụndụ nke mbụ bụ nke emepere site n’aka Ndị Nọọwei n’ime Ọstrelịa.

translation.en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
translation.ig: Njem mfe ski: A na-akpọkwa omume a bakkọntrị ski, ije nlegharị anya ski maọbụ ịrị ugwu ski.

translation.en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
translation.ig: O metụtara mana ọ naghị agụnyekarị ọdịdị njem nleta ski keugwu ma ọ bụ egwuregwu ịrị elu ugwu, nke ikpeazụ ndị a e mere n'ọdịdịala kpodara ekpoda ma na-achọ ụmụ ski na buutu kara sie ike.

translation.en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
translation.ig: Chee echiche maka ụzọ esi egwu egwuregwu skii dị ka ụzọ e si aga njem ije nke yiri.

translation.en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
translation.ig: N'ọnọdụ dị mma i nwere ike ịgarute ntoanya buru ibu karịa ịga ije - mana ọ na-ara ahụ tupu i rute ekwomọsọ nke ime skii ofe mba n'enweghị otu akpa azụ dị arụ n'ime mkpọwaraụzọ akwadogwere.

translation.en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
translation.ig: Yurop bụ kọntinent dị obere na mmetụta ma nwee ọtụtụ mba nwere onwe ha. N’okpuru ọnọdụ nkịtị, ime njem gafee ọtụtụ mba ga-apụta ị ga site na ntinye akwụkwọ maka visa na njikwa paspọọtụ ọtụtụ oge.

translation.en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị, mpaghara Schengen na-arụ ọrụ dịka mba a na-akwanyere ugwu.

translation.en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị nọrọ n'ọgbọ a, i nwere ike igafe oke ala ma zere nnyocha paspọtụ.

translation.en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
translation.ig: N'otu aka ahụ, site n’inwe otu visa Schengen, ị kwesịghịzi itinye akwụkwọ maka visa otu n’ime mba ndịòtù Schengen nke ọ bụla iche, ya mere chekwa oge, ego na mmepe akwụkwọ.

translation.en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
translation.ig: Onweghi nkwekọrịta zuru ụwa maka ngwa a na-akpọ ihe ochie. Ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ụtụ na-akpọ ngwa ndị karịrị afọ 100 ihe ochie.

translation.en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
translation.ig: Nkọwasị ahụ nwere ọdịiche kwa ọdịdị ala, ebe ókè afọ nwere ike ịdị obere karịa n'ebe ndị dị ka Ugwu Amerịka karịa n'ime Yurop.

translation.en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
translation.ig: Enwere ike ikpo ngwaahia eji aka ruo ihe mgbe ochie, n’agbanyeghi na o di ohuru karia ngwaahia ndi nke emere maka oha.

translation.en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
translation.ig: Ọzụzụ Reindeer dị mkpa nke ukwuu ọkachasị n’ime ihe banyere ndụ na omenaala ndị Sámi nakwa ahịa gbara ya okirikiri dịkwa mkpa maka ọtụtụ akaọrụ ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
translation.ig: Ọbụna n'ọdịnala, agbanyeghị, ọ bụghị Sámi niile bụ ndị metụtara n'ime nnukwu ogo ọzụzụ anụmanụ reendiya, mana biri site n'igbu azụ, ịchụ nta na ihe yiri ya, na-enwe reendiya n'ọtụtụ oge dị ka ụmụ anụmanụ akpọbatara.

translation.en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
translation.ig: Taa ọtụtụ Sámi na-arụ ọrụ n’ụmụ ahịa nke ugbu a. Njem nleta bụ mkpata egọ dị mkpa na Sápmi, mpaghara Sámi ahụ.

translation.en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị na ndị abụghị ndị Roma na-ekwu ya n'etiti ha, a na-ahụta aha a bụ "Gypsy" dị ka aha ọjọọ maka na ọ gbasara ụfọdụ ụzọ ọjọọ ndị ọzọ si ahụta ndị Roma, nke abụghị eziokwu.

translation.en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na mba ahụ ị ga-aga ileta bụrụ nke nọ n'okpuru otu ndụmọdụ njem, mkpuchi ahụike njem gị ma ọ bụ mkpuchi nkagbu njem gị bụ nke o nwere ike imetụta.

translation.en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
translation.ig: Ị nwere ike ịjụta ndụmọdụ nke ndị ọchịchị karịa nke gị, mana ndụmọdụ ha bụ ndị e mebere maka ndị amaala ha.

translation.en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
translation.ig: Iji mee atụ, ndị Amerịka nọ na Mịdụl Ist nwere ike igabiga ihe dị iche n'ihe ndị Yurop maọbụ Arab ga-agabiga.

translation.en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
translation.ig: Ndị ndụmọdụ gasị bụ naanị obere nchịkọta nke ọnọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị n’otu obodo.

translation.en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
translation.ig: Uche ndị e gosipụtara na-esekarị n'elu, n'izugbe na ntọghasị dị ukwuu ma a tụnyere ya ozi ndị a kọwara nke ọma dị ebe ọzọ.

translation.en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
translation.ig: Ajọ ihu igwe bụ aha izugbe a na-akpọ ihe ọbụla gbasara ihu igwe nke nwere ike imebi ihe, ghasaa mmekọrịta, maọbụ gbuo mmadụ.

translation.en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
translation.ig: Ihu igwe dị oke njọ nwere ike ime n'ebe ọbụla n'ụwa, ma o nwere ụdị dị iche iche, nke nwere ike idabere na ọdịdịala, ọdịdịebe na ọnọdụ keikuku.

translation.en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
translation.ig: Ụmụ oke ifufe, mkpụrụ mmiri, oke mmiri ozuzo, na ọkụọhịa bụ ụmụ ụdị na mmetụta nke ihu igwe dị oke njọ, dị ka ụmụ egbe eluigwe mmiri ozuzo, ajọọ̀ oke ifufe, ajọọ̀ ifufe mmiri, na ajọọ̀ oke mmiri ozuzo.

translation.en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
translation.ig: Ihe ihu igwe siri ike na-eme na mpaghara na n'oge ụfọdụ gụnyere blizadị, oke ikuku na ọdịda ibubeoyi, oke ikuku na ọdịda aịzị, na oke ifufe na-ebu aja.

translation.en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
translation.ig: Ana adusi ndi njem odu ike ha mara gbasara ihe ndaba nke ekpem-oku maobu di oke ukwuu nke na emetuta ogbe ha dika onwere ike imetuta atumatu ime-njem obula.

translation.en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
translation.ig: Onye ọbụla na-achọ ịga mba ọbụla bụ ọgbọ agha kwesịrị ka e kuziere ya etu e si eme ya.

translation.en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
translation.ig: Ọchịchọ n'ịntanetị maka 'Ọmụmụ gburugburu keiro' nwere ike iweta adreesị otu ụlọọrụ imeobodo.

translation.en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
translation.ig: Otu ihe ọmụmụ ga-akọwa nke ọma ihe niile a kọwara ebe a tinyekwa ahụmihe bara uru.

translation.en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
translation.ig: Ihe ọmụmụ na-abụkarị site na ụbọchị abuo ruo ụbọchị ise ma ọ ga-emetụta mmepụta omume, ọtụtụ mgbata ọsọ enyemaka mbụ na ọzụzụ maka ngwaagha n'oge ụfọdụ .

translation.en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
translation.ig: Ụmụ akwụkwọ na magaziini ndị na-akọ maka nlanarị nke ọzara juru eju, mana ụmụ mbipụta na-akọ maka ebe a na-alụ agha dị obere.

translation.en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
translation.ig: Ndị njem ụgbọ mmiri na-eme atụmatụ ịwa ahụ ntụgharị mmekọahụ na mba ofesi ga-ejiriri n'aka na ha ji ụmụ akwụkwọ ziri ezi maka njem nlaghachi.

translation.en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
translation.ig: Ịdị njikere ndị ọchịchị inye akwụkwọ ikike ngafe ndị a na-edepụtaghị jenda ha (X) maọbụ dọkụmentị emelitere ka ọ daba n’aha a chọrọ ma jenda adị iche.

translation.en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
translation.ig: Njikere nke ndị ọchịchị mba ndị ọzọ ịsọpụrụ akwụkwọ ndị a dị nnọọ ka ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe.

translation.en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
translation.ig: Ọchịchọ na ebe nyocha nchedo abụrụkwala oke nsogbu mbanye n’ike n’ime oge Septemba 11, 2001 gachara.

translation.en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
translation.ig: Ndi transgender n’emebeghi oparashon atubekwana anya na ha gafecha ihe nyocha na ha ka ga ano na nzuzo ma ugwu ha adikwachim.

translation.en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
translation.ig: Oke ọchịchị mmiri bụ mmiri na-asọlata asọlata site n'ebili mmiri tikapụrụ n'ọnụ, na-emekarị n'okwute ala mmiri maọbụ ihe yiri ya.

translation.en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
translation.ig: N'ihi tọpọlọjì nke okpuru mmiri ahụ, mmiri na-abanyeghachi dị ike n'akụkụ ole na ole miri emi, ma ike ọwụwụ mmiri ngwa ngwa ruo na mmiri dị omimi nwere ike ịmepụta n'ebe ahụ.

translation.en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
translation.ig: Imirikiti ọnwụ na-eme n'ihi ike ọgwụgwụ n'ịgbalị igwughachi azụ megide kọrenti mmiri, nke nwere ike ọ gaghị ekwe omume.

translation.en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
translation.ig: Ozugbo ị na-esi n'ọwụwụ mmiri ahụ pụta, igwughachi azụ na-aka ara ahụ karịa na nkịtị.

translation.en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
translation.ig: Gbalịa tụọ atụmatụ ọzọ maka ebe ejidebeghi gị, maọbụ, dabere na nka gị yana ma achọpụtala gị, ị nwere ike ịchere maka nnapụta.

translation.en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
translation.ig: Mmenyeụjọ mbanyegharị abia na nkpirikpi karia mmenyeụjọ omenala (enwere agba họnịịmuunu dịtụ ntakịrị), dịruru ogologo, ma nwee ike ịka njọ.

translation.en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
translation.ig: Ndị njem ndị nwere oge dị mfe ịnọgharị n’omenala ọhụrụ mgbe ụfọdụ na-enwe oge siri ike ịnọgharịkwa n’omenala keobodo ha.

translation.en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
translation.ig: Mgbe a na-alaghachite n’ụlọ mgbe e bichara n’obodo oyibo, ị nweela mmara ahụ nye omenala ọhụrụ ahụ ma tufuokwa ụfọdụ agwa gị si n’omenala nke ụlọ gị.

translation.en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
translation.ig: Mgbe ị gara na mba ofesi na mbụ, ndị mmadụ nwere ike ha nwere ndidi na nghọta, na-amara na ndị njem nọ n'ime mba ọhụrụ chọrọ imegharị ahụ nnọshị̀.

translation.en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
translation.ig: Ikekwe ndị mmadụ agaghị atụ anya na ndidi na nnagide bụ ihe ndị njem na-alaghachi ụlọ aghaghị inwe.

translation.en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
translation.ig: Ihe ngosi uda na oku piramidi bu ihe kachasi akpalite mmuo emere maka umuaka n’ebe a.

translation.en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
translation.ig: Ị nwere ike ịhụ piramidi n'ime itiri ma ị nwere ike ịhụ ha n'ịgbachi nkịtị tupu ihe ngosi ahụ ebido.

translation.en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
translation.ig: Mgbe niile ị na-anụkarị ụda ndị njem nleta na ndị na-ere ahịa. Akụkọ gbasara ụda na ọkụ dị nnọọ ka otu akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo.

translation.en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
translation.ig: Edobere Sphinx ka ihe mgbakwasa na onye na ako akuko toro ogologo

translation.en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
translation.ig: A na-egosipụta ihe ngosi ndị ahụ na piramidi ndị ahụ ma mere ka piramidi ndị ahụ dị iche iche na-enwukepụ.

translation.en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
translation.ig: Sawụt Shetland Aịlands, nke a chọpụtara na 1819, bụ ebe ọtụtụ mba na-azọ; Agwaetiti nọ na ya karịrị ndị nọ ebe ọzọ, ebe agụtara iri na isii nọ n'ọrụ n'afọ 2020.

translation.en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
translation.ig: Archipelago ahụ tọgbọọrọ na Km 120 na mpaghara ugwu nke obodo akụkụ mmiri ahụ. Nke kachasị buo ibu bụ Agwaetiti Eze George nwere ebe obibi nke Villa Las Estrellas.

translation.en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
translation.ig: Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Agwaetiti Livingston, na Nghọgbu ebe caldera mmiri tojuru nke ugwu mgbawa ka dị ire na-enye otu ebe obibi dị ịtụnanya.

translation.en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
translation.ig: Ala Ellsworth bụ mpaghara ndịna nke Penịnsụla, Oke osimiri Bellingshausen gbara ya gburugburu.

translation.en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
translation.ig: Ugwu ndị Peninsụla ahụ nọ ebe a jikọtara ọnụ ịghọ ugwu dị larịị ahụ, mgbe ahụ jikọgharịa ịghọ km 360 eriri igwe nke Ugwu ndị Ellsworth ahụ, egbubiri abụọ site n’aka Glesịa Minnesota ahụ.

translation.en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
translation.ig: Akụkụ ebe ugwu ma ọ bụ Renji Sentinel nwere ugwu ndị kachasị elu nke Antaatika, Vinson Massif ahụ, na-eru ọnụ elu na 4892 m Ugwu Vinson.

translation.en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
translation.ig: N'ebe ndị zopuru ezopu, n'enweghị netwọk ekwentị, ikekwe ekwentị satịlaịt ga-abụ naanị nzọpụta i nwere.

translation.en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
translation.ig: Otu ekwentị satịlaịtị abụghị nnọchite anya n’izugbe nke ekwentị kengagharị, dị ka ị kwesịrị ịnọ n’ezi ya na inwe ụzọ warawara ịhụ satịlaịtị iji ya kpọọ oku ekwentị.

translation.en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
translation.ig: Ọrụ ahụ bụ nke mbupu na-ejikarị, gụnyere nka obi ụtọ, ya na ụmụ njem nchọpụta ndị nwere mkpa datà ebe dịanya na olu.

translation.en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
translation.ig: Onye ọrụ ekwentị ebeụlọ gị kwesịrị inwe ike inyekwu ozi gbasara ị na-ejikọta n'ọrụ a.

translation.en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
translation.ig: Otu nhọrọ kara ewu ewu n'ụzọ na-amụbanye maka ndị na-atụ arọ ịnara otu ohere-afọ bụ ime njem ma mụta.

translation.en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ ndị si ụlọ akwụkwọ pụta na-emekarị nke a, maka ọ na-ekwe ka ha jiri otu afọ zuo ike tupu ha abanye mahadum, ma ghara imebi mmụta ha.

translation.en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ oge, ịdebanye aha n'ọmụmụ ohere-afọ na mba ofesi nwere ike imelite n'ezie ohere i nwere isonye n'agụmakwụkwọ dị elu n'obodo ebe i si.

translation.en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
translation.ig: A ga-enwekarị ụgwọ akwụkwọ iji debanye aha n’ime ụmụ emume mmụta ndị a.

translation.en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
translation.ig: Finlandị bụ ebe dị oke mma maka inya ụgbọ mmiri. “Ala nke otu puku ọdọ mmiri” ahụ nwekwara ọtụtụ puku agwaetiti, n’ime ọdọ mmiri ndị ahụ ma n’akụkụ mmiri nke òtù agwaetiti.

translation.en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
translation.ig: Na otu agwaetiti n’umu ọdọ mmiri ị gaghị achọriri ụgbọ mmiri.

translation.en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị n'òtù agwaetiti akụkụ mmiri ahụ na ụmụ ọdọ mmiri kachasị ibu bụ ndị nke buru ibu n'ezie maka yaach ọ bụla, ụgbọ mmiri ndị kara obere ma ọ bụ ọbụna otu kayak na-enye ahụmihe dị iche.

translation.en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
translation.ig: Akwọm ụgbọmmiri bụ ihe mmemme nchereoge na mba Finlandị, nke bụ otu ụgbọmmiri ibu mmadụ asaa maọbụ asatọ.

translation.en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
translation.ig: Norway, Sweden na New Zealand emegokwa ya, mana ewezụga ha, ihe a bụ ihe mmeta pụrụ iche (dịka ọmụmaatụ na Netherlands fịgọ a bụ otu nye iri anọ).

translation.en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ n'ime Njem Ụgbọmmiri Baltik pụrụiche na-enye njirimara nke ọnụnọ agbatịrị n'ime St. Pitasbọọg Rọshịa.

translation.en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
translation.ig: Nke a pụtara na i nwere ike ịwere ụfọdụ ụbọchị gaa leta obodo ochie a, ma na-echighata n'ụgbọ mmiri ịrahụ ụra abalị.

translation.en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị nọ n'ụgbọmmiri eme njem nlereanya nke naanị elu ala ị gaghị enweta visa dị iche maka ya (bidori na 2009).

translation.en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ njem ụgbọ mmiri na-enye njirimara Beelịn, Jamani n'ime ụmụ broshuọ ahụ. Dị ka ị nwere ike ịhụ site na maapụ ahụ n'elu Beelịn anọghị oke osimiri ahụ nso ma ọlị ma otu nleta n'obodo ahụ bụ nke agụnyeghị n'ọnụahịa nke njem ụgbọ mmiri ahụ.

translation.en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
translation.ig: Njem ụgbọ elu nwere ike bụ ihe egwu ny onye ọbụla agbanyeghị afọ ole ha dị maobụ ebe ha si, ọkachasị ma ọ bụrụ na ha efebeghị mbụ maọbụ na ha enwego ihe ọghọm mbụ.

translation.en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
translation.ig: Ọ bụghị ihe ihere: ọ dịghị iche dị n'etiti ya na mmadụ inwe egwu gbasara ihe nwere ike ime na ndụ ya nakwa enweghi mmasị n'ihe ndị ọzọ nke ọtụtụ mmadụ nwere.

translation.en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
translation.ig: Maka ụfọdụ, nghọta ihe gbasara otu ụgbọ elu si arụ ọrụ na ihe na-eme n'ime otu njem ụgbọelu nwere ike inye aka ịgabiga ụjọ nke dabere na ihe amaghị ma ọ bụ anọghị na njikwa.

translation.en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
translation.ig: A na-akwụ ndị ụlọ ọrụ na-ebugharị ngwa ụgwọ nke ọma maka ibuga ihe ngwa ngwa. Kwa ugboro, oge dị ezigbo mkpa n'ebe akwụkwọ azụmahịa nọ, ngwa ahịa maọbụ akụkụ nnochite maka nrụzi igwe ọbụla ngwa ngwa.

translation.en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
translation.ig: N’ụzọ ụfọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ ndị kara buo ibu nwere ụgbọ elu nke ha, mana maka ụzọ ndị ọzọ na obere ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ enwere otu nsogbu.

translation.en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ha jị ụgbọelu ziga ihe, n'ụfọdụ ụzọ, ikekwe ọ gaara ewe ọtụtụ ụbọchị igafere mbupusi na ndị kọstom.

translation.en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
translation.ig: Naanị ụzọ a ga-esi ewefe ya ọsịịsọ wụbụ iziga ya dị ka ibu e nyochagoro. Iwu ụlọọrụ ụgbọelu agaghị ekwe ha izipụ ibu na-enweghị otu onye njem, nke bụ ebe ị ga-esi bata n'ime.

translation.en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
translation.ig: Ụzọ kachasị doo anya nke ife n’ime klaasị mbụ ma ọ bụ azụmahịa bụ iwepụta nnukwu ego maka urūàmàrà (ma ọ bụ, nke ka mma, mee ka ụlọ ọrụ gị mere gị ya).

translation.en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
translation.ig: Mana nke a adịghị ọnụ ala: dịka ihe i ga-ebu n'uche, lewe anya ịkwụ ugboro anọ ihe a na-akwụ maka ekọnọmi nkịtị maka biznes, na ihe ruru ugboro iri na otu maka fest klas!

translation.en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
translation.ig: Ikwu n'ozuzu, ọ baghị uru ọbụna ị na-ele anya maka ụmụ mbelata maka ochie ndị azụmaahịa ma ọ bụ klaasị-mbụ n'ụmụ njem ụgbọelu ozugbo sitere na A ruo B.

translation.en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
translation.ig: Ndị ụgbọ elu mara nke ọma na o nwere isi òtù ndị na-agba ụgbọ elu ndị nwere ike ịkwụ ezigbo ego maka urūàmàrà nke irute ebe ọzọ ọsịsọ nakwa n’ezigbo ọnọdụ, ma gbaa ụgwọ etu o kwesịrị.

translation.en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
translation.ig: Isiobodo nke Moldova bụ Chișinău. Asụsụ keobodo ahụ bụ Romanian, mana a na-ejikarị Rọshịan.

translation.en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
translation.ig: Moldova mba nwere ọtụtụ-agbụrụ nke nke tagwere ahụhụ sitere na ndọkụrịta agbụrụ.

translation.en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
translation.ig: N'afọ 1994, ọgbaaghara a butere nkepụta Mba Transnistria kenkwupụta-onwe n'ime ebe ọwụwaanyanwụ Moldova, nke nwere ọchịchị na ego nke ya mana onweghi mba ọbụla so n'otu UN nabatara ya.

translation.en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
translation.ig: E dozigharịala njikọ akụnaụba dị n'etiti nkewa Moldova abụọ a n’agbanyeghi ọdịda na mkpakọrịta nkwe nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.

translation.en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
translation.ig: Okpukpe kachasị n'ime Moldova bụ Ụka Kraịstị Keọdịnala.

translation.en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
translation.ig: Izmir bụ obodo nke atọ kacha buo ibu na mba Tọkị nwere ọnụọgụgụ ndị mmadụ dị ihe dịka nde 3. 7, ọdụ ụgbọmmiri nke abụọ kacha buo ibu ma a gụpụ Istanbulu, na ọdụ ụgbọ njem dị ezigbo mma.

translation.en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
translation.ig: Obodo ochie nke Smyrna na mbụ, ọ bụzi ugbu a otu ebe na-ewi ewi, mepere emepe, na azụmaahịa dịnọrụ, e wubere gburugburu otu nnukwu ọnụ mmiri ma ụmụ ugwu gbaakwa ya gburugburu.

translation.en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
translation.ig: Ụmụ buulivadị ahụ sara mbara, ụlọ ndị nwere karama n'ihu ha na ebe ụlọ ahịa na-ewi ewi bụ ndị e wubechara n'iji eluụlọ taịlị-uhie keọdịnala, ụlọ ahịa narị afọ iri na asatọ ahụ, na ụmụ ụlọ alakụba na ụlọ ụka, agbanyeghị n'obodo ahụ nwere nkwụrụ nke kara bụrụ Mediterranean Yurop karịa Tọki keọdịnala.

translation.en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
translation.ig: Obodo Haldarsvik na-ekwe ka ahụta Eysturọị, agwaetiti dị ya nso, ma nwekwaa ụlọ ụka akụkụ asatọ pụrụ iche.

translation.en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
translation.ig: Na yaadị ụlọ ụka, e nwere ụmụ nduru akpụrụ n’ofe ụfọdụ ili na-adọrọ mmasị.

translation.en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
translation.ig: Ọ meritere nkeji iri atọ iji gagharịa n’ime obodo ahụ na-akpali akpali.

translation.en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
translation.ig: Na aka-ugwu ma gburu-gburu dikwa nso igaru di obodo ihunanya na itunanya Sintra bukwa nke emere amara-amara nye ndi mba-ozo ka akowaputara idi-ukwu ya n’uzo egbuke-egbuke site na-aka Onye-nwe Byro.

translation.en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
translation.ig: Bọọsụ 403 Scotturb na-eme njem mgbedum aga Sintra, na-akwụsị na Cabo da Roca.

translation.en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
translation.ig: Ọzọkwa n'ugwu leta nnukwu Ebe Nsọ nke Nwanyị Anyị nke Fatima (Ebenchụaja), otu ebe ama ama n'ụwa niile maka ụmụ ihe ngosipụta nke Marịa.

translation.en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
translation.ig: biko cheta na ebe ina aga izute bu n’ezie ogige eliri otutu ozu, dika kwa nwere ihe-oputara ana agaghi agutali onu nye okere onu-ogugu uwa putara-ihe

translation.en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
translation.ig: A ka nwere ọtụtụ ndị dị ndụ taa lanarịrị oge ha nọrọ ebe a, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ndị nwere ndị ha hụrụ n'anya ndị e gburu ma ọ bụ jiri ọrụ gbuo ha ebe ahụ, ma Ndị Juu ma ndị ọzọ na-abụghị Ndị Juu.

translation.en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
translation.ig: Biko kwanyere webụsaịt a ugwu niile dịịrị ya. Ejila Họlọkọst maọbụ ndị Nazi eme ihe ụka ọchị.

translation.en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
translation.ig: Emebila saịtị ahụ site n'ise akara maọbụ ịkanye grafiti n'ime ihe ndi owuwu.

translation.en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
translation.ig: Ụmụ isi asụsụ nke Baselona bụ Katalan na Spanish. Ihe dị ka ọkara kara chọọ ịsụ Katalan, imirikiti na-aghọta ya, ma onye niile kendịnuche mara Spanish.

translation.en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
translation.ig: Ma otu-osi-di, ihe-ngosi ka n’onu ogugu ka egosiri na asusu Catalan nani n’ihi na eguzosiri ya ike n’iwu dika asusu nke bu nke obodo.

translation.en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
translation.ig: Ma, a na-ejikwa asụsụ ndị Spenụ njem ọha ebe ọ dị ukwuu nakwa akụrụngwa ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
translation.ig: A na-ama ọkwa mgbedum na Metro naanị na asụsụ Catalan, mana mmesasị nke a na-emeghị atụmatụ ya bụ ndị a na-ekwuputa site na sistemụ akpaghị aka n'ọtụtụ asụsụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.

translation.en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
translation.ig: Ndi Parisi nwere aha imaara isi, nganga na mpako.

translation.en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
translation.ig: Mgbe nke a na-abụkarị naanị nhụnuche na-ezighị ezi, ụzọ kachasị mma iji na-aga n’ihu n’ime Parii bụ na ị nọ n’omume gị kachasị mma, na-eme ka onye bụ "bien élevé" (a zụrụ nke ọma). Ọ ga-eme ka ngagharị n’ebe ahụ kara dị mfe.

translation.en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
translation.ig: Agwa ọjọọ Ndị Pari ga-akwụsị ọsịịsọ ma ọ bụrụ na i gosi ụfọdụ nruweisi nkịtị.

translation.en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
translation.ig: Ebe nnọkọọha mba nke Ụmụ ndọrọ mmiri Plitvice nwere oke ọhịa, nwejuru ụmụ osisi beech, spruce, na fir, ma nweekwa mwụkọta nke Alpine na ahịhịa Mediterranean.

translation.en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
translation.ig: Onwere otutu osisi ama ama, maka ebea nwere klimeti di icheiche, aja ya di iche iche, altitude ya dikwa iche n’iche.

translation.en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
translation.ig: Ebe a bụkwa ebe obibi nye ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche nke ụdị ụmụ anụmanụ na ụmụ nnụnnụ.

translation.en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
translation.ig: Ụmụ anụmanụ nke ebe obibi pụrụ iche nke anaghị ahụkarị dị ka anụ ọhịa bea ndị Yurop na-acha uri, agụ owulu, ugo, ikwiikwii, nwamba oke ọhịa linz, e nwere ike ịhụ nwamba oke ọhịa na eruru, ya na ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọzọ a na-ahụkarị.

translation.en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
translation.ig: Ụmụ nwanyị na-aga na monastrị ga-eyi sket na-ekpuchi ikpere ha ma mechiekwa ubu ha.

translation.en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ n'ime ebe obibi ndị mọnk na-enye akwa mkpuchi maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị bịara na-adịghị njikere, mana ọ bụrụ na ị weta nke gị, tụmadị nke nwere agba chapụrụ achapụ, ị ga enweta otu mmụmụ ọnụ ọchị sitere na mọnk ma ọ bụ nọn nọ n'ọnụ ụzọ ahụ.

translation.en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
translation.ig: N'otu ụzọ ahụ, a chọrọ ka ụmụ nwoke na-eyi ụmụ traụza na-ekpuchi ikpere.

translation.en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
translation.ig: E nwere ike ịgbaziri nke a kwa site n'akwa ndị nọ n'ọnụ ụzọ mana anaghị asa akwa ahụ ma mmadụ yichaa ya mere ị nwere ike ị gaghị enwe ahụ iru ala iyi sket ndị a. Otu nha na-adaba ụmụ nwoke niile!

translation.en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
translation.ig: Nri ndị Majorca, dị ka nke ndị mpaghara ndị yiri ya n'ime Mediterranean, na-adabere n'achịcha, akwụkwọ nri na anụ (tụmadị anụ ezi), ma na-eji mmanụ oliv mgbe niile.

translation.en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
translation.ig: Pa amb Oli bụ nri abalị dị mfe nke amaara ọkachasị n'oge sọma: Achịcha na mmanụ oliv, tomato, na ụmụ orishirishi ndị ọzọ dị adị dịka chiizi, azụ tuna, dzg.

translation.en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
translation.ig: Aha niile, tinyere okwu Sie maka gị, na-ebidokarị n’iji mkpụrụ edemede ukwu, ọbụnadị n’etiti ahịrịokwu.

translation.en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
translation.ig: Ụzọ a bụ ụzọ dị mkpa e si amata ihe dị iche n’etiti ụfọdụ ngwaa na nnara.

translation.en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
translation.ig: Ọ na-emekwa ka ọgụgụ dị mfe karịa, mana edemede bịara ratụ ahụ maka aghaghị ịmara ma ngwaa maọbụ nkọwa aha ọbụla ọ bụ mpụta ahịrịokwu ahụ.

translation.en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
translation.ig: Mkpọpụta okwu dịtụ mfe n' Ịtalịan ebe ọtụtụ mkpụrụokwu bụ ndị a na-akpọpụta kpọmkwen etu esi dee ha

translation.en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
translation.ig: Ụmụ isi mkpụrụabịdịị ndị a ga-elesi anya maka bụ c na g, ebe mkpọpụta ha na-adị iche na-ndabere na ụdaume na-esote.

translation.en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
translation.ig: Jisiekwa ike hụ na ị kpọpụtara r na rr n'ụzọ dị iche. caro pụtara ezigbo, ebe carro pụtara ụgbọ ịnyịnya.

translation.en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
translation.ig: Asụsụ Peshịa nwere ụtọasụsụ kacha dị mfe ma bụrụ nke a kacha agbaso.

translation.en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
translation.ig: Ya bu igu akwukwo uto asusu ga enyere gi aka imuta maka uto asusu Persia makwa ghota ahiriokwu ofuma.

translation.en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
translation.ig: Ọ baghị uru ikwu, ọ bụrụ na ị mara otu asụsụ Ịhụnanya, ọ ga-adịtụ mfe ịmụta asụsụ Pọtụgiiz.

translation.en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghi, ndị mara asụsụ Spenụ obere nwere ike ikpebi ọsịịsọ na ya na asụsụ Pọtugiizi yrir nke ọma na o kwesịghị ka a mụọ ya n’iche.

translation.en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
translation.ig: Ọbzavetrị ndị oge gara aga anaghị abachazi uru taa; e jizi ha eme ụlọ ndokwa ihe nka maọbụ ebe mmụta.

translation.en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
translation.ig: Dị ka mmetọ keọkụ n'isimbụ ha abụghị ụdị nsogbu ọ bụ ugbu a, a na-ahụkarị ha n'ime obodo ma ọ bụ na kampọs, nke dị mfe irute karịa ndị ahụ arụrụ n'oge ugbu a.

translation.en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
translation.ig: Otutu teliskop eji eme resaach n'oge ugbu a bu nnukwu ulo oru di n'ebe dipuru adipu nwere ezigbo ihu igwe.

translation.en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
translation.ig: Nlere ifuru Cheri, nke a maara dị ka hanami, bụ omenala na Japan kemgbe nari afọ nke 8.

translation.en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
translation.ig: Echiche ahụ sitere na mba Chaịna bịa ebe plum blossom bụ okooko kacha amasị.

translation.en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
translation.ig: Na Japan, Onye eze Emperọ haziri mmemme mkpụrụ osisi cheri izizi maka naanị ya na ndị otu ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọchịchị Ụlọ ikpe etiti.

translation.en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
translation.ig: Ụmụ akụmakụ na-adị n'ụdị ha kacha mma mgbe ha nọ na gburugburu ebe obibi ekere, ya mere gbochie ọnwụnwa iwepụ ọbụna "naanị otu" ihe nlere.

translation.en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eleta otu ubi ahazigoro etu o kwesịrị, ị na-ewere "ụmụ ihe nlere" ga-eme ka a chụpụ gị, na-emeghị mkparịta ụka.

translation.en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
translation.ig: Singapore bu kwanu ebe di mma ino makwa igaghari ma inwere ike igote ihe o bula i choro ma irute.

translation.en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
translation.ig: Mana ị na-edobe gị n'ime "ebe ndị na-ekpo oke ọkụ" ị ga-achọ naanị digiri ole na ole n'ugwu nke ikwuetọ imeso ma ekpomọkụ (mgbe niile) ma anwụ siri ike (mgbe elu igwe kpochara ekpocha, nke kara raa ahụ omume).

translation.en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
translation.ig: E nwekwara ụfọdụ burumbu na-aga mgbago ugwu ruo Hebrọn, ebe ọdịnala e liri ndị nnaochie nke akwụkwọ nso bụ Ebraham, Aịzik, Jekọb, na ndị nwunye ha.

translation.en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
translation.ig: Lelee na bọọsụ ị na-eche maka ịbanye na ya na-aga Hebron ma ọ bụghị naanị na ebe obibi ndị Juu nke Kiryat Arba dị nso.

translation.en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
translation.ig: Ụzọ mmiri ndị ime obodo nwere ike ịbụ ezigbo isiokwu iji hazie oge ezumike.

translation.en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
translation.ig: Maka ọmụmatụ ileta ụmụ nnukwu ụlọ n’ime Ndagwurugwu Loire, Ndagwurugwu Rhine ma ọ bụ ime njem ụgbọ mmiri gaa obodo ndị na-adọrọ mmasị n’ime Danube ahụ ma ọ bụ ịgba ụgbọ mmiri n’ogologo ụzọ Kanaal Erie ahụ.

translation.en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
translation.ig: Ha na akọwapụtakwa ụmụ ụzọ a ga-eso maka ụzọ haịkịnụ na ọghụgha igwe ama ama.

translation.en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
translation.ig: Ekeresimesi bụ otu n’ime ezumike kachasị mkpa nke Ndị na-eso Ụzọ Kraịst, ma a na-eme ememme ya dị ka ncheta omumu Jizos.

translation.en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
translation.ig: Ndi na-ekweghi na Chukwu na mba ndi otu Kristi gasi ma ndi n’abughi ndi otu Kristi n’uwa niile anabatago otutu odinala enwere maka oge ezumike.

translation.en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
translation.ig: Enwere ọdịnala maka ịmụ anya n'abalị Ista n'ebe mepere emepe iji hụ ọwụwa anyanwụ.

translation.en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
translation.ig: Enwere n'ezie nkọwa na nkà mmụta okpukpe nke Ndị Kraịst maka ọdịnala a, mana ọ nwere ike bụrụ emume ọmụmụ tupu nchụaja Oge mmiri na Ọmụmụ nwa Ndị Kristi abịa.

translation.en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ ụlọụka agba ochie na-amụkarị anya abalị Ista n'abalị Satọde n'oge ngwụcha izu Ista, ebe ndị ụka na-abanye na mmemme ma ọ kụọ elekere abụọ nke etiti abalị iji mee mmemme mbilite n'ọnwụ Kraịstị.

translation.en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
translation.ig: Ụmụ anụmanụ niile ndị nke bịarutere n’ime agwaetiti ndị ahụ bịarutere ebe a site n’igwu mmiri, ife efe ma ọ bụ ise n’elu mmiri.

translation.en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
translation.ig: N'ihi ogologo ntoanya site na kọntinentị ahụ ụmụ anụ na-an̄ụ ara enwenwughị ike ịga njem ahụ ya mere na-eme nnukwu mbe isi anụmanụ na-ata ahịhịa n'ime Galapagos ahụ.

translation.en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
translation.ig: Ke,gbe mbịarute nke mmadụ na Galapagos, ewebatala ọtụtụ anụ na-an̄ụ ara gụnyere ewu, inyinya, ehi, oke, nwamba na nkịta.

translation.en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị leta ụmụ ebe Aktik ma ọ bụ Antatik n'ime oge oyi ị ga-enwe ahụmihe nke abalị pola, nke pụtara na anyanwụ agaghị awa na horaịzọn ahụ.

translation.en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
translation.ig: Nke a na-enye ezigbo ohere iji hụ Aurora borealis, dị ka eluigwe ga-agba itiri karịa ma ọ bụ obere gburugburu elekerea ahụ.

translation.en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
translation.ig: Dika ebe ndị ahụ bụ ebe ndị mmadụ ebichabeghị etu ahụ, na mmetọ nke ọkụ ya mere anaghị abụkarị nsogbu, ị ga-enwekwa ike ịnụ ụtọ ụmụ kpakpando.

translation.en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
translation.ig: Omenala ọrụ ndị Japan nwere ogugo na iwu dị iche iche karịa ihe ndị ọdịda anyanwụ maara.

translation.en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
translation.ig: Suutu uwe azụmaahịa izugbe, ma ndị ọrụ ibe na-akpọ onye ọ bụla site n'aha ezinụlọ ha ma ọ bụ site n'aha ọrụ ha.

translation.en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
translation.ig: Nkwekorita nke ebe oru di nkpa, na-ekwusi ike na mbọ otu karịa ito ụmụ mmezu nke otu onye.

translation.en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
translation.ig: Ndi oru kwesiri inweta nkwado onye isi ha maka mkpebi obula ha ga ekpebi, ha kwesikwara irube isi n’ozi o bula onye isi ha ziri ha n’ajughi ajuju.
